11.title: Molly

113.content:
Molly awoke to a new day, the sun shining, the birds chirping. Her eyes fluttered open, Molly chuckled and sat up, stretching her large frame, looking around at the flatland plains in which she was allowed to sleep on. Being 800ft. tall was quite inconvenient if she were to ever try and reside within the city.

She quickly changed from her pajama's into her normal clothing, doing it fast as not to give the perverts watching satisfaction. As she made sure her clothing was in proper place, she couldn't help but feel a little guilty. It must've cost millions of dollars and a vast amount of resources to give her the necessities such as food and clothing. Even though she couldn't help it, being born with, as the doctors called it, a 'defect'. She was born normal sized, but rapidly through her youth, she reached heights no normal person could ever achieve. Scientists guessed it was a combination of isolated mutation and just shitty luck.

Now, Molly looked down, her family resting in a small home beside her. She was always first to get up, and sh made sure to never bother them if they were asleep. That was qute hard, as she walked away, the orange goth cringed as with each footstep, she generated a quake.

What does Molly need to do today?
113.title: Orange Giantess

choices: Someone tries to get her attention.
Nothing special happens, *Time skip to lunch*
1131.content:
Quakes aside Molly was quite good at NOT causing damage at this point, it had become second nature to know where to step, when to step, so much so that even those below felt that the 800ft giantess was 'normal' to them, school was rather interesting as well, she was oddly able to hear everything from everyone in the room as if she was right there with them. While she didn't really participate much. (No one could see her raising her hand.) She was able to do the work via a custom made tablet just for her. As she arrived she kept quiet and to herself, the anti social girl felt somewhat saddened. She was greeted by both guys and girls alike, some who wanted to be friends others who wanted to see her breasts, the perverts that they were. Others just being polite. "Hi..." was all she could say back and it was really soft, even for her size, her wave was really all that indicated she was returning the greeting. She sat down outside and got out her tablet, the day was going by smoothly and 'normal'

Author's note: I would like to apologize to AwesomeX18 if I have done his OC wrong. I don't know anything other than the info provided, so hopefully I did well with this.
1131.title: Go To School

1132.content: It being a sunday, she decided to visit some friends, or rather bring them out of town to talk without people listening. It wasn't really anyone's fault, her voice was just quite loud. She came to her friend's home closest to where she sleeps. This happened to be her closest male friend, Jack. He was a bit quirky, but always has a joke (for better or worse) in store for his friends. Add that to his strange voices and faces, you have a clown that doesn't wear make-up. She tapped lightly on the roof above his room, which was connected to the deck by a sliding door. He came put onto the deck, looking up into the air. "Oh, good. I thought it was the other 800 foot girl that wears bright orange all the time. I don't think she likes me so much." Molly smiled and held out her hand to the deck. "Get on, or do you want me to stop liking you so much?" He jumped the railing and landed on her palm. She brought him up to her face. The first time he met Molly, he was scared stiff by how huge she was. In comparison, he could basically stretch out and possibly touch both sides of her fingernail. She looked at him. Discovering he looked the same as usual with his black hair that went where it pleased, untamed by comb or brush and normal sweatshirt and jeans he wears besides summer and the hotter part of spring. She smiled and moved on to Vanessa, her friend who she would relate most to. She tapped on her roof, and she came out into her backyard. Luckily, the two she had picked up lived just outside of town. Vanessa was basically Jack's opposite. She took great care in her appearance. Taking a while to perfect her hair, make-up and clothes. She was serious, with her long blond hair and blue eyes. She and Jack argue frequently, usually causing Molly to laugh about why they even argue. Her third friend, Harriet, lived in the middle of the town, so Vanessa sent her a text to get outside of town. They wait and.....

choices: "Destroy the planet you live on, and make you a higher being."
"Aid you in your power lust to help you protect what you love."
Show you what power you already have.
1133.content:
Molly wanted to grow, why she grew, she didn't know, why she wanted to grow however was another story, bigger Molly, meant more power, more power meant more to protect, she loved the world and wanted to protect it, not just from others who would do harm to their fellow human's but from herself. Her very being itself was a danger if she accidentally stepped on someone or something, which she never did on purpose. She felt a surge in her mind upon this very thought.

"Took you long enough little one." Molly noticed the world turn a bright blue around her, like one of those anime's where the world freezes in time. But...this was real.

"Who are you, where are you, what are-?" She took a step back then froze in fear. "NO!!" She had just stepped on the small home her family lived in, then she looked down to her surprise (And relief) no one was harmed nothing was destroyed, her shoe phased right through the house turning transparent. "What the-?"

"Don't worry child, you couldn't hurt anyone or destroy anything even if you wanted to, watch." A massive explosion like a nuke being set off could be seen in the distance, yet nothing was destroyed, nothing harmed the explosion was there, Molly felt it, she felt the impact it had like a shockwave yet...no consequences outside of the natural impact. "May have over done it for a mere demonstration there." The voice said calmly. "Well as you can see nothing is harmed. So please walk as much as you'd like." Molly did so, slowly at first but then broke into a run, then a sprint, then a jump, he had been so long since she could move freely she had forgotten what a joy it was. A soft giggle or chuckle could be heard now and then.

"Oh!" Molly stopped. "I'm so sorry I didn't mean to-"

"Please play all you wish." The voice echoed inside her head. "I am very patent and this 'spell' of mine won't wear off till I want it to. Everything is frozen, time itself has stopped. You could be here for years and not even a second would pass in your world. Now for some answers although vauge, who am I? I have no name, where am I...you wouldn't be able to see me child I'm far too big for you to see and if I wasn't as powerful as I am....well lets just say microscopic is an understatement for our comparison to how small you are. No offense." Another soft chuckle. "What am I? I...don't really know myself. I'm sorry for such vauge answers, but I'll tell you something here Molly I'm going to-"
1133.title: Growing for more than pleasure.

114.content:
The girl sighed as she awoke, wiping the sleep from her eyes. Her yawn echoed across the planet, as did the following booms generated by the slightest of movements. Most people could see only an unfathomable wall of orange outlined with soft skin. This was the visage of Molly, a teenage girl who stood at a towering 1000 miles tall. She slowly stood up to her full height, casting a shadow halfway around the world. She only wore a set of tight, matching orange bra and panties, her pale yet fully-figured form filling the sky. As she looked around, a few things crossed her mind, her morning checklist, something she had come to do ever since she became a towering teen.

1. Don’t step on anything...
2. I need a bath...
3. Visit Boyfriend. Haven’t seen him in a while.
4. Give that government man a piece of my mind, cutting off my supply rations like that...
5. Do daily world-walk around.

Hmmm...Might as well take that bath first, that way I’ll be set for the rest of the day.

The massive ‘anti-goth’ goth girl, known to the rest of the world as Mega Molly, slowly moved towards the Atlantic Ocean, a step’s distance away to the teen. With a gentle step, the girl had reached the seemingly endless plain of water, her footfall causing small quakes to resound throughout the surrounding area. Upon reaching the cool waters, Molly slowly sat down, submerging as much of her enormous frame as possible into the ocean, still wearing her trademark bright orange underwear that matched the color of her hair.

“Ahhh, this never gets old,” she sighed contently. “Sorry about this, fish, but a girl’s gotta bathe somehow.”

Molly dipped her hands into the ocean and lifted them, picking up millions of gallons of salt water and even chunks of the sandbed at the bottom. She poured it across her body, the dirt that had been captured by her titanic frame washing off with the waves. She repeated this a few more times then stood back, allowing herself to drip-dry. A few more minutes later, she was ready for her day.

Okay, I could visit Allen now...or go to that mean old government man....or, my walk around the planet. Yep, I think I’ll go with that one.

Clad in her form-fitting underwear, The massive Molly began walking, her footsteps creating quakes around the planet.

“Okay everyone...”She whispered, her voice timid, yet thunderous to the small people far below. “I’m...gonna start walking now. Y’know, my daily tour of the planet. Prepare yourselves.”

The people of Earth began to make their daily preparations, mainly activating the various shock-absorbing technologies to lessen the effects of Molly’s daily stroll. Luckily for the inhabitants of the world, Molly had made sure to always follow a certain path in her walks, making sure to step in the imprints she had made in the planet during her first worldwide tour, making only certain areas of the globe actually vulnerable to the aftershocks produced by her footfalls.

“Cool, so, here I go...”

With a quick movement, Molly stepped onto the nearest imprint of her foot, now bringing her near the European coast. The next imprint was on the southern half of the continent, which she quickly matched her sole with as well. However, Molly’s ocean romp would come to an end on her next step as she took her body onto land once again, moving onto northern Italy.

She quickly crossed the small country, going over England, France, and through Europe with minimal damage. She went around the coast of Asia in a few minutes, and rounded around Africa next. With each step, powerful shockwaves shook the planet, but everyone was prepared. Mostly, they were in awe. Her entire foot could devastate the world if she so desired, but Molly was too kindhearted to let such a thing happen. Ever since she was young, the girl was the most gentle giantess ever. When she was five and over a hundred feet tall, she’d let the children use her as a playground when she accidentally crushed the first one. When she was thirteen and peaking in puberty, at 1000ft. high, she still went to school, and was as gentle as ever. But nearing the age of 18, her growth had exponentiated, spiraling her higher and higher. Scientists claimed that she’d be going giga by the time she was 21. However, these were only estimates, and being only now 17, Molly’s body was rearing itself to prove these scientists wrong, her form already in the “Giga” range now that she was an astounding 1000 miles tall. Luckily for her, Molly was given a pair of underwear when she first entered high school, the current bright orange bra and panties she wore to this day. These clothes were not supposed to enlarge along with her body, but for some reason that even the world’s top scientists couldn’t comprehend, they grew perfectly along with her body, both to accommodate her height and her blooming features, mainly her impressive chest and curvy form. Some believed Molly’s love of the underwear and the fact that they complimented her goth-like nature perfectly may be the reason why they continue to grow, but nothing has been proven in terms of her possessing the ability of “macrokinesis”.

Nevertheless, Molly eventually arrived back in the United States a few minutes later, feeling accomplished at her latest world tour.

“Okay...check that off the list.”She mumbled to herself, gently tapping her foot against the planet as she began thinking. No signs of trouble across the globe, the countries seemed to be in perfect order. That was the thing with Molly’s presence, it had lessened the threat of war across the globe. Warring countries were now allies, as if seeing her made everything calm.

I think I’ll talk to that government man next...
She approached the coast of America, her bare feet playfully drumming along the edges of beaches, her toes towering walls of flesh, and her feet emitting a bit of stench onto land, but the small people didn’t mind.”Erm...Mr. Cross?”She called out for the government official that she had to meet on a daily basis.”I...I would like to speak with you.”

Of course she would get no reply. She was simply too big. Instead, she sat down and held out her open palm in wait for a tiny jet that would bear the man. After a few minutes of waiting, a small plane landed on the edge of her hand, a few tiny mites walking onto her palm.

“Well, well, well, if it isn’t miss ‘Mega Molly’ herself,” the government official laughed. “I gotta say, my kids really love that nickname of yours.”

“Hey, it wasn’t my idea, but it does have a nice ring to it,” the titaness whispered. “Anyways, I really have to talk to you about...”

“Let me guess, about your rations, right?” Mr. Cross interrupted. “Sorry kid, I hate to break it to ya, but you’re getting too big to feed. We regular people gotta eat too, ya know.”

“You could’ve at least told me this earlier!” Molly retorted. “Now what am I going to do for food?”

“Beats me kid, all I know is that you’re on your own now.”

“So you’re...going to let me starve?”

“No, no, of course not. That’s why I brought these science guys with me,” he explained as he motioned for his companions to draw nearer. “Tell ‘em guys.”

“Molly,” one of them began, “do you remember the incident from many years ago? You know what we mean.”

“Oh, you mean THAT incident? I sorta do, but I haven’t seen my older brother in years. Why he ran after that giant jogging girl is beyond me...”

“Well, it sort of concerns that incident...”One said.”Ever since you grew, your entire body chemistry has changed. You eat, yet you require not to. How long has it been since you’ve actually felt your stomach empty or growl with hunger?”

She pondered it.”Um...never, actually.”

“Exactly. Look at you! You don’t even need to breathe! You’ve evolved beyond human needs. And I think it’s for the better of our food sources if you stop eating...”

“Oh...but I’ll miss the taste of oranges, I guess...”

“Don’t worry, you’ll get used to it.”The scientists condoned her.

“I guess so...”Her massive head drooped.

“Oh Molly, don’t be so glum.”Mr. Cross chuckled as he and the scientists began boarding the jet.”How about I bring my kids tomorrow? They haven’t seen you in forever!”

“I’d like that very much, Mr. Cross.”She allowed a smile to play at her lips.

“Wonderful.”

With that, they took off, leaving Molly only one task left on her to-do list. Her eyes turned to a small town on the edge of the country...

“Hey cutie-kins!” the orange-haired girl waved as she took a step towards her hometown. “I’m coming to see you!” In just another few seconds, Molly had happily stomped her away across the continent, bringing her feet in a familiar position on both sides of the small village. “Spiral-cutie, where are you?” she sweetly asked. “I can barely see people these days.”

Another few seconds passed before an orange flare exploded near her right big toe, a familiar signal that the two had decided on long ago.
114.title: Orange, Orange World

1141.content:
“Oh, there you are! Alright, don’t move now...” Slowly, Molly bent downwards as carefully as possible, trying to make sure high winds wouldn’t be stirred up by her massive frame. Next, as the rest of the country received an amazing view of her cleavage, she gently picked up a small speck with her index finger and thumb, depositing the mite on her palm before standing up once more. “Hey there, hottie,” the orange goddess smiled down at her normal-sized boyfriend. “Either you’ve gotten smaller or I’ve gotten bigger since I last saw you...and I don’t think I’ve grown an inch since then...” she teased, knowing full well her body had been packing on the size recently.

The speck smirked, even though she wouldn’t be able to see it, the playfulness in his voice made her smile.

“You’ve always been big, a trait of yours that I just love.”Alan Spiral replied by cupping his hands around his mouth and shouting.

“Oh, stop it...”She blushed a tad. They had been steady for two or three years down, back when Molly was much closer to the ground at only a hundred miles tall. Molly liked that he cared more than her body, but her quiet personality. She did the same, as she could not properly see him, she had to judge people by their words. For the next several hours they spoke as they always did until the sun began to settle across the world. Molly lowered him back down and waved a kiss goodbye before heading back out to see for sleep.

“Okay...to-do list for tomorrow...”

1. Don’t step on anything...
2. Gotta keep in shape, maybe exercise.
3. Try to reach my brother again. I know I won’t, but I still gotta try. Last time I did it was a few months ago. He’d probably freak if he knew how big I was now, but then again, he and Spiral were best friends, so...
4. Remember to visit Mr. Cross and his family.
5. Do daily world-walk around.
6. Make sure to stay in water as much as possible. I’m due for a big one any day now.
7. Do 1-5 before 6 possibly happens. Well, maybe just 1-4.

“Works for me,” Molly smiled as she laid down on her makeshift bed in the world’s seas. “Later guys, catch you tomorrow.”

As soon as she rested, her snores gently lulled the remainder of the waking world to sleep, echoing across the solar system in their calmness. Within eight hours time, the sun peeked itself over the curvature of the world, it’s light awakening the goddess of a teen to a new day. She yawned and stood up, stretching to her full height to work out any kinks or sore muscles that had built up in her body overnight.”Alright...”She mused, remembering the list she had created last night.

“I suppose I should do some morning exercises. Can’t keep myself this pretty without doing anything...”She blushed to herself.

She laid down on her back, holding her hands behind her head. Slowly she began lifting her torso upper, performing crunches and toning her already slim stomach. Just the slightest movement from her created tremors, and her gasping breath as she reached the higher number in crunches generated heat that changed the temperature across the world that day, leaving some places sweltering. Once she was done with that, Molly moved onto push-ups, lowering herself down then pushing right back up with her arms. But she wasn’t actually moving herself away from the earth, in fact she was pushing the earth down from herself, her strength and size alone enough to move the planet out of it’s orbit momentarily as she continued her work out. She stood back up and took in a deep breath to fill her lungs, when in reality she wasn’t tired at all. Even after performing over a hundred reps for the previous two exercises, her muscles didn’t even burn. She truly was beyond mundane things such as keeping up ones own body, but she liked to do it, helped her remember what it was like when she was small and human. Now, she was onto her last exercise.

With her back facing the United States, Molly slowly bent at her knees, putting her full weight into her legs as she did squats, slowly moving down, then moving back up, repeating it. As she performed this task, many people gazed up in awe at one thing: Her butt. Every time she bent down, each cheek, easily 200 miles in size, would fill the sky with orange fabric stretching taunt across her behind, then to rise up again.

“Okay...done.”Molly said after another hundred squats, not even out of breath. She turned around to her home country, smile on her lips, and hands on her hips.”Mr. Cross! I bet your little kids are ready for a visit from the Mega Molly Monster!”She chuckled as she stepped onto land, making sure her massive bare feet collided with empty countryside.

In only a few steps, Molly had reached the same spot she was in the day before, extending her hand to await the arrival of the government agent. A few minutes later, the same jet made its descent on her palm, several small dust mites exiting the aircraft soon afterwards.

“Alright kids, just remember to be careful,” Mr. Cross told his two children, a boy and a girl, as they stepped on to the seemingly endless skin landscape before them. “Don’t want you two to get lost.”

“Like I could lose them on myself,” the goth girl laughed.

“Mega Molly!” the two called out.

“Hi guys! How’ve you been?”

“Goooooooood.”

“That’s great. Haven’t seen you guys in a while.”

“You got bigger!”

“Well, just a couple miles, but yes, I did. The Mega Molly Monster is still growing!” she added with a playful roar.

The kids laughed as they smiled up at the towering girl, all three of them enjoying the visit.

“Alright guys, that’s enough. C’mon, we don’t wanna bother her,” Mr. Cross alerted them.

“Awww, but we just got here!” they pouted.

“Now, now, it’s fine. You can always see me on TV,” Molly reminded them.

“But it’s not the same...Well, bye Mega Molly!”

“Bye guys! Have a safe trip back!”

They cheered to her as they re-boarded the jet, their short visit ended as it took off. Molly turned to the rest of the country as she prepared for the next item on her list.”Hey bro! I’m looking for ya!”She started walking, only a single footstep taking her to the location of where her small sibling might be. It had been years since she saw him last, and he’d probably be amazed at how she’s grown, but he always did enjoy having a giantess as a sister. Molly knelt down slowly, her eyes scanning the ground, roving over mountains that weren’t even comparable to her toes, over cities that could fit into the palm of her hand with plenty of room to spare, and fields and fields of green grass. Eventually she stopped at her hometown.”Bro...you down there?”She whispered, tapping the ground gently with her finger.

Of course, the signature orange flare replied right where the finger was. She moved it forward, allowing the heat and oil glands of her skin to stick her brother to the pad of her forefinger. She brought it slowly up to her face, eying a mite of living dirt on the landscape of skin.

“Hey, AX.”She whispered his nickname.

“You only found me because I wanted to be found,” he replied back. “Otherwise, you would’ve never found me.”

“Like I haven’t found you for years!” she pouted. “Just where have you been all these years?! Last time I saw you was with...”

“Upupupupupupup! Don’t you say it!” he quickly hushed her. “You know you’re not supposed to discuss it.”

“Ugh, stupid government secrecy...” Molly sighed. “Well, what can you tell me?”

“Let’s just say that 1) We’re still together...technically, 2) She’s still growing, and 3) She’s still wearing what you last saw her in.”

“So if she’s still growing...then how did you get back here?” his sister wanted to know.

“Well, when you get larger, let’s just say you develop certain powers...Wait, why am I telling you this again?”

“Because you’re a blabbermouth!” the titaness chuckled.

“Ha ha, very funny Mol,” her older brother sighed. “Anyways, you’ve certainly gotten bigger since last I saw you. You were, what, only a couple hundred feet then?”

“Yep, and now I’m a solid 1000 miles of me!”

“Ah, I see...So that means now that you’re a literally bigger idiot,” he laughed.

“You know, I might just accidentally squeeze my finger...” Molly teased.
1141.title: To-Do List

11411.content:
“Uh huh, of course you will, and I’m some sort of wizard. Very funny,” AX said sarcastically.

“Keep it up bro, and I’ll tell the whole world your actual name...”

“...That...won’t be necessary...”

“Kidding!”

“I knew that...Anyways, I’m actually impressed with how huge you are. Might be outgrowing the planet soon enough too, huh?”

“Yeah, sadly...”

“Hey, don’t get depressed, Mol. It’ll be fun! You’ll still get to interact with everyone, and you’ll have tons and tons of room to be you.”

She rolled her eyes.”Interact with everyone? I’d just end up crushing the planet. And I haven’t been able to be me since....forever.”She sighed. She always had to be careful, always to be under watch and scrutiny, or somebody would get hurt from her massive size. This was one of the factors that had lead to her timid demeanor, yet also for her kindness as well.

“C’mon, don’t get all depressed on me.”

“I’m not.”

“You so are.”

“Are not!”

“Totally are.”

“I will crush you.”

“You love me.”

“...”

Molly let out a little laugh, a thunderous boom that shook the world a little.”Yeah, you’re right, I do.”

After some more chatting, Molly finally settled AX back on solid ground, walking away with his words in mind:”Let loose a little! The world can take it...I think.”

She sighed as she stepped back into the ocean.”But...how? Maybe a walk’ll help me think straight...”

Molly looked out at the world, eyeing the nearest imprint for her daily walk.

“Um, hey, everyone...” she said timidly, her thunderous voice carrying across the globe. “I’m gonna start walking now, so prepare yourselves. Daily stroll across the planet and all.”

The goth girl then began to stride towards her nearest footprint, making sure to align her foot perfectly with it before stepping down on the coast of the United States. Slowly, the orange-clad goddess began to walk once again, her every footfall causing the land to shake.

Just let loose a bit... Molly told herself. Just...let myself go...Just...let loose...

As these thoughts resounded throughout her mind, Molly suddenly felt a familiar pulsing sensation echo throughout her body. Unfortunately, the anti-goth goth was still lost in thought, not realizing she was about to start growing in the middle of her next step.

With her eyes closed and her mind wandering, the orange giantess shot up in height, quickly leaving a thousand miles behind, her much larger foot landing in what once was her footprint, creating a even bigger print and destroying a good portion of the US’s east coast. Still she continued walking, she had mentally memorized the location of her footsteps, but as she grew, destruction would only follow. She came across Canada and devastated the center of it as she neared 2000 miles tall, and yet her size upgrade persisted. This continued on until she had finished her walk around the world, leaving even larger craters, destroyed landscapes, and Molly at an even bigger 5000 miles tall, her size powerful enough to rival the planet.

Slowly she opened her eyes, still thinking of ways to let loose and simply be a normal teen, but that wouldn’t happen.

“Did I...get bigger?!”

Molly looked out at the planet before her, viewing that her vantage point of the world was now radically different, seeing the curvature of the planet now. As she stared out at the globe, she saw massive footprints all across the planet, each of them had devastated a large area of former human life.

“Did I do all this?!” she whispered, her voice now a godlike boom even in a soft voice. “I’m so sorry everyone! I didn’t mean to do anything. I didn’t even realize I was growing! I promise to stay in the ocean from now on! I’m sorry once more, and I’ll leave the Earth when I’m bigger...”

The orange giga lifted her mighty foot from the ground, taking her first aware step as a 5000 mile titaness, the impact of her foot shaking the planet to its core.

“I hate to say this, but for once, I can’t wait to get even bigger...”

Molly sat down, her all-encompassing butt rattling the planet once it made contact with the ground. She had found the large ocean a tad smaller, leaving her maneuverability lessened even further. With a sigh she leaned down with her hand supporting her chin, utterly downcast and almost on the verge of crying. But she held them back, knowing that they would probably cause a flooding along the coast of some countries, adding to the destruction she’s already caused.

“I just wanna be normal...and do something fun that won’t hurt people...”She sadly whispered to herself, but her magnified voice carried it to ears all over the world. People did feel genuinely sorry for the orange goddess.
11411.title: Mega Molly Getting More Massive

114111.content:
“Why am I the one who always has to suffer like this?”

With her daily checklist complete and still down over all the chaos she had caused with her latest unexpected spurt, Molly gently stretched her massive frame across the oceans, making sure her body would not crash into any landmasses as she rested.

“Well, I’m going to bed everyone,” she whispered, her voice easily carrying across the globe. “Goodnight, and I’m once again sorry for all I did. No more walks around the globe for me starting tomorrow; I don’t want anyone else getting hurt because of my size.”

With a heavy sigh, the orange goth slowly fell asleep, her gentle snoring still soothing the masses of the world.

And so Molly slept on, the rest of the world worried for what could be the fate of the orange giantess. Would she still be as kind as ever, or would her newest size lead to a change in personality? Instantly videos sprang up across the globe of her growing and destroying continents, some people criticizing her and creating anti-Molly groups, others doing the exact opposite; A Molly support group, giving funding for the giant goth to help her. Either way, most of it came down to a draw, half hated her, half loved her.

“Ahh....”

Molly awoke with a content yawn, her sleep incredibly peaceful despite her actions the previous night. But when she had rubbed the remnants of dreams from her eyes, guilt had overcome the pit of her stomach once more. Her mood was downed almost immediately the moment she awoke.

“Okay...”She whispered half-heartedly to herself.”Let’s see what my to do list for today is...”She went over it in her head.
1. Don’t step on anything...
2. Avoid doing anything...no walking around the world!
3. Maybe talk to Mr. Cross? See the damage I’ve done...
4. Oh....class field trip!"

It instantly came to her. Despite her gargantuan and intimidating size, Molly still needed some form of education. So, the school district that she attended when she was smaller would send a teacher to speak with her on various subjects from day to day. It had been planned almost a month ago, but the teacher, Mrs. Wight, would be bringing her class with her, some kids Molly hadn’t seen in some time, and let them have a little....field trip. It was a discussion of the human anatomy.

“That’s right, I totally forgot!” Molly said aloud. “We have that field trip today to...me! I gotta get over there!”

Making sure to move as slowly and gently as possible, Molly slowly picked herself off of the ground and proceeded to take one monumental step towards her hometown. Despite her cautionary tactics, her foot still caused tremendous shockwaves to echo throughout the continental United States, though not as bad as if she had took a normal step. Placing her toes at the edge of the coast, Molly’s beautiful form towered impressively over the country.

At 20 she should have outgrown this brattiness by now, but not Vera. She was spoilt and has never grown up. She was moody, demanding and could be remarkably uncaring at times to the needs of others. Yet she was intelligent and sexy and had a winning smile when she wanted to put it on and had her doting father round her bling clad little finger. This was helped by the fact that when she didn’t get her way she tended to break things, as many cities and their inhabitants had found to their cost over the years. Daddy who incidentally was normal size was very very rich and influential and had got many powerful people, companies and governments and their wealth on his side to provide Vera with all her wants. The alternative couldn’t bear thinking about. The military had tried to do something but it was Daddy’s daughter and the world had come to accept the giantess in their midst, enduring the hammering Vera gave it, even when she wasn’t having a tantrum. As the sun shone off her multiple earrings, necklaces , bracelets and rings, her would be $10,000 gold Cartier watch, her nose stud was a solid 1ft diameter sphere of solid gold and her belly button ring was the size of a small car, blinding planes for miles, she suddenly became aware of something happening. The view was spectacular, the boots were 250 feet tall, 125 feet long and more than 50 feet wide at their widest point as they rested on several low loaders. They were standing upright as Vera wanted to see them, and supported by dozens of helicopters with supporting chains. They must have cost $100m with the huge discount given. Several bridges had to be dismantled to allow the boots to pass, although Vera herself had helped in this regard, a recent major rampage had destroyed much of the infrastructure in this part of the world. As she got up to look her right foot casually and uncaringly and accidentally planted itself on a historic building…”no, not that “, grimaced her father, it was one of the best items in his property portfolio, only to be met with an icy stare from the golden ice queen…….and she padded over the landscape towards the procession………..
“Come on give me them!”, she demanded, as she snatched them, “get my socks!”. “Noooo, wait…”. Too late, she didn’t wait for the helicopters to disconnect the chains or the low loaders to release the boots, it was carnage, the lowloaders, dozens of helicopters and their crews, and she ended up stepping on the wreckage. Then she turned to her father and the assorted businessmen and politicians with a smile that melted hearts, “thanks, daddy”…….before walking back to where she was previously, where her bag was. Supremely satisfied, she was a happy bunny as she skipped, much to the further distress of the landscape. Meanwhile her socks were there to her delight.
As she crashed down by her bag to put on the socks and then the boots, she noticed her soles. “s“%^*$! My feet are so dirty, I do need to wash them. Yawn! Too far to walk”. She was in one of her frequent lazy moods, her sumptuous pad was only 100 yards away for her (8.5 miles), hidden by mountains. At 2 miles by 2 miles and 1,500 feet high it had all the rich giantess about town could wish for and more and cost a cool $10 billion to build and that was before fitting it out. “oooo, look, a reservoir….”, she said chirpily. Sensing what was about to happen and not being able to do a thing about it, the authorities quickly scrambled a squadron of planes to get one of her towels. Trampling a suburb or 2 on the way she reached the reservoir and plunged her feet in…”aaah!”. Oblivious to the fact the water was flooding everywhere she splashed around before taking the towel (which had got there just in time, there was no thanks for getting it, she just assumed it was there) she sat down on some nearby soft trees and wiped her feet. Tossing the towel away where it snagged a passing train she took her socks and put them on. “Now, the boots…”, she smiled. Seeing they weren’t there she screamed, “get me my $&^%ing boots!”. Glaring at the planes (these to her inferior ants should have been quicker off the mark) she turned round and looked at the glorious VERY tall Louboutin boots and her face turned into a beaming smile. She wiggled her boot clad feet in the ruins of the town she had laid on previously and just loved the look of these smooth black boots with a very tall heel and the trademark red sole. “Hmmm, I must test these out, where should I go?”

Everyone seemed to exchange looks with one another, no one sure what to do next. Their nervousness froze a majority in place. Jaz didn't take too kindly to that, "Hmph…I see how it is…Maybe I can…" Her toes wiggled more water into people's homes, "…give you a little incentive…"

No one was sure what she meant until she did it. The sky seemed to be growing darker. Spaces seemed tighter. There was a rumbling sound from the bottom of Jaz's foot moving against the Earth. She was lowering her foot! Only one idea popped into everyone's minds. It wasn't doing what Jaz asked either. It was quite the opposite.

Panic.

With mere minutes to live against Jaz's bare foot absolute anarchy spread instantly. People started screaming. Some trying desperately to drive out of range of Jaz's foot, traffic quickly backed up. Desperate people began attempting to steal, fight, or simply just start trouble. No one seemed to realize Jaz asked for something very simple. With each passing second the city grew darker beneath Jaz's shadow. And with each second the panic increased even more. All of the world watched as this unfolded, unsure of where things would go.

Jaz's sole began touching the edges of small buildings, people expected them to crumble away instantly she continued her descent. Some did, many did not. Her descent stopped. The bottom of her sole was completely flat as the rest was now looming at a much closer position.

"Really guys? I'm not asking for a lot, I just wanna see what it's like to be worshipped. I mean, it gets pretty boring out here for me. I just wanted to have some fun."

The giantess' loud voice seemed to bring back reason to the people in a wave of calm. They were never in danger, she just wanted some fun…Jaz was always known for being playful. Mischievous even. In their fear of her recent display of power, everyone seemed to have completely forgotten that fact. As well as the fact Jaz was a person like them. Even if it was out of fear, people began to give the black girl what she wanted. People began to bow before her looming foot. Those closer, as in, near where her foot was planted, even began to massage the small bottom of her skin supporting her entire foot.

Jaz let out a happy sigh. It was exactly as she'd imagined. Thousands of people, bowing, submitting to her like she was a Goddess…Never had the girl had so much fun. She let out a girlish giggle, "Thanks guys, this really made my day." Even if they acted out of fear; the innocent giggle of a teenage girl done right seemed to make a good deal of citizens feel good about themselves. The world over people breathed easy knowing Jaz hadn't gone evil on them.

"After this I think I'll even let you guys hang in my boobs for a while…" She grinned. Plenty of people cheered, but not all as Jaz noticed. "…Or my feet…butt…mouth…whatever makes you guys happy. I think you earned it." That got most of them.

The giantess felt a small temptation to lower her foot so all it could be worshipped like that one man did…kissing…even licking…That sounded wonderful. But doing so would undoubtedly crush all the people beneath her, and that simply wouldn't do. Jaz wouldn't deny it though, the thought was tempting enough to consider for a moment…Just a moment though.

Goddess Jaz…Has a nice ring to it...She whimsically thought; maybe during these little worship sessions she could get people to call her that. That'd be nice…The idea of being a Goddess seemed perfect actually, given Jaz's height, power, and overall like of being worshipped. But she wasn't that mean. Perverts, Bad People, Mean People, and for Fun. It was a slight amendment to her principals, but she'd stick with them.

Although Jaz couldn't resist, her words came out before she even realized it. "Would you guys mind…kissing…my foot…?" The many buildings up against her large soles gave the perfect spot to do so. And just once, to feel over 10,000 people submitting to her like that…She'd be happy for the rest of the year…She doubted anything would come or happen from it though.

However, something did happen…

At first it was very subtle. Being directly before the looming for of a giantess, many didn't notice at all. The giantess herself was far too happy with the recent fun she had to pay any mind to it at all. But a few people caught on. And almost all of the people outside of her foot's range noticed. Sooner of later, the rest of the people and Jaz noticed it too. Many of the speck-sized people in comparison had begun to climb buildings to give Jaz what she asked, mainly the people absolutely terrified and those who were into feet. Once on the roof beside her foot though, they noticed a few things.

First off, the foot seemed to keep coming closer. It loomed just close enough that one could touch or worship it, but it kept approaching at a very slight pace…the pace was quickening. If one looked to the distance where Jaz wasn't hovering her foot, they would see the shadow of her, stretching over more and more land with each passing moment. It was all too obvious what was happening, though many wished it wasn't so. Jaz's eyes widened with curiosity as she felt her foot pushing against the buildings more…but she wasn't moving it. Her other foot seemed to have begun touching land too, and places that were fuzzy in the distance looked clearer…

"I'm…growing…?" Jaz muttered in surprise. With the realization it became so much clearer. The buildings Jaz so carefully placed her foot against were getting crushed by the growth of her body, as well as the people who obeyed her wish. All who were left simply stared as the already enormous giantess grew even larger. The 89-mile high Goddess was getting even higher…faster and faster.

In its growth Jaz's body caused much destruction she hadn't intended. Her body's close position to the land for some fun quickly worked against her. The bottom of her foot she embedded into the ground expanded itself right on top of whoever was near it. It crushed those who worshipped her foot from the bottom as it grew to outsize the butt-print from before, and start growing on to the shoreline. Jaz's foot in the ocean brushed against coral as well as land as it began its own size-adjustments. Soon the toes were brushing over buildings, and crushing them upon contact. Hundreds were dead already, and it wasn't the worst part.

What was worst was Jaz's uplifted foot…at least, once uplifted. In the process of expanding, the giantess' sole came closer and closer the ground, as well as expanding over more of it. Each second killed dozens if not hundreds, until finally the growth had caused Jaz's foot to touch the Earth itself. She couldn't move it either, as since she was growing, she had no idea what was stable anymore or if moving her foot would cause something worse to happen. The best thing she could do was sit still, and watch as her foot destroyed much in the process of growing even more dangerous. The very planet itself soon began to give way as Jaz was now stepping on it, all people beneath the illustrious beautiful foot dead and more dying as it only got bigger.

Words couldn't come close to describing Jaz's heart at that moment. The whirlwind of emotions that was the heart of a teenage girl became a tempest, a hurricane dozens of times more powerful than any other emotional stage. The girl felt intense sadness at all the people she could feel crunching beneath her, yet so small she couldn't even see them aside from the dirt on it. Men, Women, Children…all sorts of people had their lives cut short by her little game. Her guilt-ridden heart should've brought lakes of tears from her eyes.

But another few emotions prevented that. There was a sort of…perverse pleasure Jaz was subconsciously gaining from all this. Her joy was to feel powerful and well…this did the job. Simply by standing there, people were crumbling beneath her like bugs. Goddess Jaz…She mentally repeated what she came up with minutes ago. At the moment, the words were as true and real as the giantess herself. As it was, Jaz had the power and stature of a Goddess…she never quite realized how close she was to achieving her fantasy until now. She got her wish and what happened? She only got greater. Perhaps this was fate. Or maybe Jaz's body was telling her something her mind didn't…maybe she was meant for this…She felt so…so powerful. As her height maxed out she felt she could crush small states and countries beneath her feet.

The two conflicting emotions battled it out. The perverse pleasure Jaz was gaining as a result of feeling powerful, and the overall kind and gentle nature she had. Both were a part of her. Both were right. Both were something she wanted. Which one was superior? Was enjoying herself and her new size what she wanted? Or did she want to go and mourn for those lost? Try to figure out something to do to prevent stuff like this again. She didn't know. As her emotions kept on arguing she stared at her foot as the growth finally subsided.

She couldn't measure it with gaze alone, but Jaz's feet now encompassed 40-miles of solid land. Both feet dug nicely into New York and had thousands of lives splattered on their soles. Jaz herself towered over the entire state, at a looming 200-miles, more than double what she had been before. Her shadow completely blotted out all light in New York, as well as half of the neighboring states. Her body seemed to block out all of the sun for all the state residents.

Unable to do much else, Jaz raised her foot at long last and brought it back to the water, where she retreated. A few steps back, her feet were submerged again and she could feel the evidence of her destruction going away with the ocean's tides. Her eyes locked onto the two foot prints covering much of the city, one pretty much all on land, the other about halfway water, halfway land, both perfectly flattened and rounded to perfectly match Jaz's foot's shape. It was essentially nothing but dirt now. There were a few buildings left, but most of them were embedded deeply into the black girl's sole as she grew. They were no doubt currently being washed away by the water she stood in.

The world seemed to grow eerily quiet to the giantess. Her head was high enough now she couldn't even hear the lower world. All her thoughts turned to herself. Her clothes were barely on, literally, with each moment her bra and shorts had a few more rips and seams in them. It was like a woman wearing clothes built for kids. The already high-cut shorts now became a record for booty shorts, literally cutting about halfway into her bottom. They practically resembled underwear in shape at this point; none of her legs were covered. Jaz's expanded chest was barely contained in its feeble bra, but the garment held together well enough to do its job, admittedly barely. Jaz was lucky as far as her glasses went. Glass was hard to come by in pieces for someone of her size, so a scientist actually came up with a special invention that essentially made Jaz's glasses grow with her. For whatever reason it didn't apply to clothes but she head they were working on that. It'd be quite convenient in things like the current situation, in which she was revealing about as much as someone in a tight bathing suit.

She was more attractive than ever, and the awe-rendered people were in awe for more than one reason because of that. No one was aware of the mental conflict going on inside the giantess right now. No one except her. It seemed something was decided though. As Jaz…

When in trouble, there was always one thing a teenage girl could do to make herself feel better: get condolences from her friends. Being a giantess, a beautiful one at that, Jaz had no lack of friends all over the world; but there were only a few she actually considered to be best friends. Some of the kids from her hometown in Virginia, surely they'd be able to help cheer her up a tad. With her eyes she located the small speck that was Hampton, Virginia in the mild distance. Half a dozen states away from New York, yet to Jaz it barely registered as a walk. Regardless, hearing some comforting voices would do her some good; the giantess rose to her feet, a small, but loud boom which echoed like all the others. So as to not be rude, Jaz called out to her friends, "Hey! Guys! I'm visiting home for a bit!" There was no conceivable way her voice wouldn't have reached her friends. It may not have been…the most polite way to inform her friends, but in light of recent events Jaz didn't care. Actually…she wouldn't have cared anyway. She took a few steps into the ocean, already over a fourth of the way there.

Inside the coast-town of Hampton a few people began to make their way to the beach. None of them lived too far from it, about ten minutes at best, and they knew whenever Jaz was on her way it was time to head there to meet her. Especially with what happened not too long ago with her recent growth, the news had yet to shut up about it. By the time Jaz had arrived to Virginia, there were already two people there, with others likely on the way.

It eased Jaz's heart upon seeing the two familiar specks, the two people closest to the beach and, in-turn, the people who got there the fastest, her closest friends: Whitney and Robert. Upon arriving just at the right distance, Jaz carefully lowered herself so her face would be right before her friends. Just the right amount of distance so she could see and hear them. Both her friends showed clear surprise at how much bigger Jaz was, but they didn't have any negative looks or comments regarding it. Ever since Jaz grew they were perhaps, the most understanding.

Robert was the best male friend Jaz had. A young white boy from a slightly poor family. Smart and a tad witty, but he was always the first person to offer to help solve a problem. More often than not, he had useful insight too. Robert tended to dress in jeans and t-shirts, not too different from Jaz actually. Only, obviously, he wore stuff made for men. At about 5"11" he stood at a nice fair height, although absolutely nothing in comparison to his gigantic friend. It was also pretty much certain he had a crush on Jaz, and would often go extra leaps and bounds for her. But Jaz never reciprocated the feelings, not to mention the fact she couldn't exactly get intimate with a boy the size of dirt to her. Surprisingly it had next to nothing to do with Jaz being a giantess either. Robert had feelings for her for years, back when she could loosely be called "normal-sized." In his eyes, her height just made her more beautiful.

The other friend was Jaz's closest female friend, Whitney. She was a young black girl with a complexion and facial structure not unlike Jaz herself. The key difference was longer hair, often worn down, and a slightly less endowed body. In all fairness though, the latter was hard to determine considering Whitney generally wore a black hoody and jeans with boots. Her body was something she never showed off because Whitney was incredibly shy. The kind of person who rarely, if ever, talked; although with Jaz it was quite the opposite, she opened up to the giantess all the time. Not exactly a chatterbox, but it was pretty evident she was a lot closer to her friend than anyone else. Even Robert had a hard time getting any words from her. Personality-wise, she was a lot like Jaz though. The main differences were volume and confidence. Jaz had no problems speaking her mind and getting in your face (Her size helped quite a bit) whereas Whitney usually just shrugged or used facial expressions to convey what she means. In terms of tastes, basic personality, and even looks, the two were quite similar. A lot of people joked they were twins back when they were closer to the same height. Nowadays people wonder something else, as Whitney never showed any interest in men. Now, that may be shyness, but many people often found it curious she had no problems opening up to Jaz. At 5"5" She was shorter than Robert, but again, nothing in comparison to her giant friend.

The black giantess couldn't help but giggle a bit at seeing them even smaller than before. "Hey guys. Miss me?"

Whitney nodded, mumbling something inaudible. Robert's eyes shifted to Jaz's cleavage for a moment, "Uh, y-yeah. How've you been Jaz?" If she were any smaller, Jaz would've noticed his face was a tad red.

"Not too good…" The black giantess slumped. She extended a finger towards the coast, carefully stopping her nail before it came anywhere near anything resembling civilization. That left it about ten feet from shore; they got a little wet doing it, but her friends climbed aboard and Jaz brought them up closer to her face.

Up close, it was even harder for them to believe how much she grew. Her fingernail alone had enough space for whole city blocks. The looming face of their friend was just…so large…it was hard not to feel insignificant. Between the two of them they could…hell they couldn't even cover half of a percent of Jaz's immense face. Her pores seemed like they were sizable enough for them. And from Jaz's perspective, even up-close, it was like looking at two ants.

Whitney stepped forward to pat Jaz's finger in consolation. Robert did the same, "Yeah I heard all about what happened. I'm sorry to hear…" Nothing much else could be said. Jaz wiped out thousands. The fact she stopped sobbing and was actually capable of anything other than flat out being sad was enough a miracle in itself.

"I didn't mean to do any harm…"

Surprisingly Whitney spoke up; more surprising considering Robert was there. "What's done is done. You didn't mean to do anything bad and we all understand that…" Quite lengthy from her, her voice was surprisingly feminine unlike what one would expect from a quiet girl.

Jaz smiled, "Thanks Whitney, you always know what to say."

"She never says anything." Robert pointed out.

"Maybe you could learn from that." Jaz retorted.

All three of the friends stated laughing a little bit.

"I'm already feeling a bit better." The giantess smiled.

"We're just that great." The small male friend grinned; Whitney bonked him on the head.

The friendly carefree banter of the three friends continued on for quite some time. With people helping her mood Jaz was able to temporarily forget all about the trouble she'd caused and the destruction of her feet. Her closest friends were here with her, that's all she'd needed. Other, not-as-close friends, showed up from time to time. But seeing Jaz already had her favorites doing the job needed, they moved on. Trouble in the world was getting worked out slowly but surely. Jaz's voice echoed enough that many heard her conversation, and they realized she was hurt more by this tragedy than anything. Something would have to be done of course, but a lot of people were a lot less angry than they were before.

After about two hours of talking Jaz noticed the sun was directly above her, signifying midday. She looked down to her boob, addressing the two specks on it. "Thanks for everything guys."

Having been placed on the appendage by Jaz due to laziness, Whitney smiled softly and nodded. Robert did the same, mainly because that the location prevented him from speaking without making it painfully clear he was infatuated with the giant girl. Or at least, he couldn't talk without seeming like a pervert.

"You know…" Jaz looked to the sky, "Sometimes I get a little lonely being this big. I mean…I don't have anyone else like this…I can't hug anyone, kiss anyone, or even touch someone like this. I wouldn't mind if I had a little bit of company at my size for a while." She looked to Whitney, "We'd have a lot of fun eh Whitney?"

"What about me?" Robert piped up.

"You'll be our pet." Jaz laughed playfully. Whitney chuckled, Robert laughed too but he didn't exactly respond negatively to the retort.

"I have you guys either way." She smiled, "Best friends right?

Both her friends nodded.

Jaz felt her mood lift a lot. There was still the faint sadness, but her friends had done wonders for her mood. She meant what she said though. Despite all her attitude, being a giantess was really lonely for Jaz. She often wondered what would happen if someone like Whitney grew, or if she were shrunken to normal size. Even if just temporarily.

Ha, like anything's gonna happen.

"Everybody wake up! It's another bright and sunny day!"

Taking the sting as nothing, Miss Spiral resumed her relaxed position, stretching her arms out, unknowingly either sending the entirety of the ground troops flying or crushing them."What a perfect day..."She whispered happily to herself, rolling over to her front so that her back would be as equally tanned. Within minutes of Miss Spiral turning onto her stomach, 20 nuclear missiles were readied, each powerful enough to annihilate large cities in a single blow.

“This day can’t get any better,” Miss Spiral happily hummed to herself as she continued to lie down. “Everything’s been just so perfect! I should take a beach vacation more often!”

With the command given, the missiles were launched simultaneously from all over Africa, each one of them seeking the same target: The living goddess known as Ellen Spiral.

Miss Spiral perked her head up to a low whistling sound. She turned her head, ears piqued for the curious noise."Does anyone else hear that?"She spoke aloud, fully knowing nobody replied, she just like to think of the conversation as an option. Within seconds of the sound, a massive jolt of pain erupted across her back as twenty nuclear arms crashed into her, generating massive mushroom clouds and enough radiation to kill countries dozens of times over.

The leaders of the nations cheered, a confirmed direct hit. But as the dust settled, their cheers turned to dismayed gasps at the sight of an unharmed, very, very angry Miss Spiral. And worst of all...she seemed to be growing.

Normally, Miss Spiral was a very calm and collected woman, her naturally cheery disposition and optimism making it practically impossible for her to become angered. In fact, the only time in her entire life that she ever became mad was when she overheard someone use a string of expletives and swiftly punished them for their foul mouth. However, due to the intense pain she felt, even at her immense size, she could no longer restrain her emotions: She. Was. Mad.

“That...HURT!” the growing woman screamed, her godlike voice waking up the entire planet as she slowly stood back onto her bare feet. “My vacation is RUINED!”

The string of nuclear blasts had jump-started the titaness’s temporarily halted growth, causing the dead period of her size chart to end and her growth condition to become reactivated. No one knew if her body would soon be enlarging soon to make up for the growth she had missed, but they knew one thing for sure: The old saying was indeed true - “Hell hath no fury like Miss Spiral’s scorn.”

"Who is responsible for RUINING MY VACATION?!"She screeched, shattering glass across the planet and probably bursting a few eardrums as well. In her rage, her eyes turned to the more populated regions of the continent of Africa."You."She pointed a finger at the landmass."You couldn't just let me have a nice little tanning session...."She seethed as she turned from 1500 miles tall to a peaking 2000, and still growing. The Sahara was quickly running out of room for her to stand on, and the cities closest to her were evacuating as quickly as they could from the walls of flesh that were her toes ever nearing them.

"SOMEBODY needs to PAY for what they did."

In that instant, her growth reached an astounding 2500 miles, making her as tall as the USA was long. Fortunately, her growth halted...for now.

With her newly obtained height, Miss Spiral took her first step, her clothes tearing due to being too tight, but she cared not but only for revenge for the cruel deed done against her...

Like a swift punishment from the heavens, Miss Spiral stomped onto the center of the African continent...hard. In an instant, tens of millions of lives perished under her titanic sole, many innocent people extinguished in a moment’s time along with hundreds of cities and villages. With the impact of her foot hitting the Earth’s crust, the massive woman sent shockwaves coursing through the entire planet, causing 6.0 earthquakes to rock the remainder of the planet while a cataclysm larger than any numbers on the Richter scale devastated the continent. In fact, her impact was so powerful that her foot went through the planet itself, leaving a foot shaped crater in the middle of the landmass which quickly filled with volcanic lava from beneath the planet.

Having felt her step obtained her desired effect, Miss Spiral slowly lifted her foot up from the ground to examine her work, smiling proudly at her actions.

“You think THIS will make up for what you did to me?!” she thundered, her engaged voice echoing across the globe. “Oh no, you need to PAY! You just caused me to rip part of my clothes too! And I LOVE my sports bra and shorts!...I’m just getting started!”

Miss Spiral bent down, revealing to the other half of the world her butt, stretching out her arms as wide as they went, digging her hands into opposite sides of the continent."This is what you deserve for hurting me..."She whispered fiercely. Like a female Atlas, Miss Spiral gave a mighty grunt as she heaved and picked up the entire landmass of Africa, holding it high above her head like a prize to be won. She tossed it into the air with all of her considerable might, the chunk of rock floating into space aimlessly. In a matter of minutes, every remaining survived suffocated due to the lack of oxygen. Without remorse, Miss Spiral wiped her hands of her deed, and turned back to her home, the United States.

"I'm terribly sorry you had to see that, everyone..."

Despite her monolithic size, Miss Spiral’s two children were her entire world. She could do anything to the planet and the world to have fun, but the last thing she would ever do would be do harm her children, even only accidentally. Even throughout her rapid increases in size, Miss Spiral always tried to prevent her children from her adventures, though she did occasionally ask for a foot massage, but only as a joke. The group was lead by her ex-husband, a man who could not take having such a....freak for a wife. Though their opinion was unpopular, the group had a strong number of supporters amongst politicians eager to win votes and extremists. Only once before had the protestors tried something drastic...sending a firebomb at her when she was a mere 500ft. tall. It ended with half of downtown New York destroyed and many of the Anti-Spiralers going to the hospital that day. But this was...too far.

“Well, we have their location, but...”

“But...I was told not to tell you where,” Dr. Connor replied.

“Why not?!” Miss Spiral asked. “My kids are in danger!”

“Well, since you removed Africa from the planet like you did earlier, the government is just being cautious of your increased strength,” he explained. “I’m afraid we can’t give you that information for fear of what you may do.”

“Thank you very much,” Miss Spiral smiled. “Hold on kids, Mommy’s coming!”

In a matter of minutes the scientists had packed their equipment and flew far away from the wrath of the giant mother. Miss Spiral stood up to her full and proud height eager for the task ahead. She would save her babies, win the nation’s love yet again, and sting her prick of a husband.”Oh yes....”She smiled almost mischievously this time.

Even so, these scientists continued to monitor Miss Spiral even while she slept; she was known to occasionally have a growth spurt while she rested, but these occurrences were usually rare. Still, her mammoth frame had to be monitored nonetheless.

As she slept, her gentle snoring soothed all of those in the Eastern Hemisphere who were currently awake, her slumber placing all of them in a calm mood as per usual - this was another reason why Miss Spiral was accepted by most nations despite of her size: Her voice managed to bring peace to the world by activating a wave of tranquility that swept through the planet like that of a siren’s.

---------------

As the sun began to rise along the western seaboard, its massive light shone down upon the nude 2500 mile mother of two resting peacefully, even in sleep a smile present on her face. Slowly, her body began to turn in the ocean, signaling that the titaness would soon be awake once again, eager to finally take a personal vacation. Of course, she wouldn’t forget to wake everyone else up as she did every day before going off on another gigantic adventure.

With a yawn, she stood up, wiping the sleep from her eye and stretching her body heavenwards to work out the kinks in her muscles that had come from lying still for so long.”Wakey wakey, everyone...”She spoke, gently tapping her hand into the ground below, small vibrations waking up the world to their day as well.

“Alright, let’s see what I can do today...”She said to herself, hands on hips as she scoured the lay of the land around her. She turned towards a goal she had not visited in some time, Asia. With a grin, she began her five-step trek towards the largest landmass in the world.”Hello Asia!”She greeted with a small wave.”I guessed the biggest continent in the world wouldn’t mind the biggest woman in world visiting them?”She chuckled.

To whomever would look up, all they would see was a foot dominating the landscape and a vast expanse of a shadow stretching over their land, and above that foot, a mighty, curvy colossus disappearing into a blur she was so high in the atmosphere.

“So then, I’m here strictly for fun, so go ahead and continue doing what you’re doing. I’m just here to take a much needed day off,” she explained with another chuckle.

With a quick movement of her body, Miss Spiral plopped her butt on the continent’s eastern coast and stretched out her luscious legs in front of her while gazing out over towards the rest of Asia. As she gently rubbed her calves and thighs, she quickly spotted something that piqued her interest.

“Oh! Is that the Great Wall? I guess it’s true what they say, it CAN be seen from space...Just like me!” she giggled. In fact, Miss Spiral was actually telling the truth: If one were to open up Google Earth, one could see her easily sticking out from the planet near the United States, the most recent image captured about a month ago when she was at a much smaller size. “Would you mind if I did a little bit of measuring? I’d love to see what’s bigger, it or me now!”

Not like anybody could reply, she leaned over towards the wall, extending her hand towards it, hovering her fingers directly over the structure, whoever standing on the wall at that moment catching a glimpse of the sheer magnitude of the being before them. After holding her fingers towards it in every direction, she took it that the wall’s thickness didn’t even compare to that of her fingernails. Her longest finger was a good fraction of the wall’s length.”Wow, I really did grow, didn’t I?”She said to herself in surprise.With every growth spurt, she had begun to take it as a commonplace thing. She would find increasing increments like feet or yards barely noticeable, and even miles didn’t faze her. But a thousand mile jump? That just made her all giggly.

“Alright, thanks for letting me use your wall!”She grinned, laying back down to enjoy some sunning. But, she felt a tiny, tickling sensation on her sides. Peering down, it seemed she had...worshippers.

“Hmmm? Oh, hello down there little guys!” she smiled warmly at the tiny people near her hips. “Come to make sure I had a great day off? My, what service! I’ll have to come to visit Asia more often; it’s like I’m being treated like a goddess!”

Miss Spiral didn’t know how right she was; with her size comparison stunt at the Great Wall, many people who had never viewed the titaness up close became enamored by her sheer size and beauty, despite only seeing a fraction of her curvaceous form. Combined with her recent jump in height from yesterday and her dual displays of power, various people on the continent, mostly men, began to regard the American mother as a true goddess, simply praising her name in respect for her size and strength.

“Hmmm...Well, let’s see...” she pondered for a moment before coming up with an idea. “Oh, I know! What’s a vacation without a nice massage to go with it? Mind if I get a little bit of pampering?”
1422221111.title: The Adventures of Mega Miss Spiral, Pt.5

14222211111.content:
The worshippers were only too eager to reply as shouts of “YES!” resounded nearby.

“Wonderful!” she giggled. “It’s good to know even someone as big as me is treated with such kindness. Now then, I’ve got just the place you can work on...”

She placed her hand beside the large group of mites that had gathered by her, and they eagerly climbed aboard, though it took some a few minutes to scale the massive wall of flesh. Miss Spiral was patient though. Once she made sure all were centered in her palm, with her free hand, she plucked a group of over a hundred men onto one finger, sitting up, reaching down, and depositing them in between her big and second toe.”Hope you guys don’t mind the smell of feet.”She chuckled, returning her attention to the ones still in her palm. The process repeated with a hundred or so worshippers being placed inside her naval, along her thighs(though, she did warn them not to go near her vagina), some more between her other toes or actually on the appendage itself, and even some of the lucky ones were placed atop of her chest.

Laying back down flat, she grinned.”Alrighty boys, get to work!”

Closing her eyes in relaxation, Miss Spiral could feel thousands of tiny sensations all across her magnificent body, each of them joining together to form the equivalent of a full-body massage. Despite where they may have been placed, the worshippers were as fervent as they were before, enjoying rubbing the soft skin of the 2500 mile woman they considered a deity.

“Mmmm...Yes, just like that...” she moaned softly. “This is absolutely wonderful, even better than my day at the beach yesterday! Keep up the great work!”

Inspired by their “goddess”’s praise, the men continued to work hard, making sure the mammoth mother was enjoying her day in Asia.

Her rest continued for an hour, the men working hard to keep her massaged and pleased. Her voice alone caused them to stop immediately and listen to her every word.”Oh my...thank you so much everyone, it was so nice and pleasant!”She announced happily, reaching all over her body and regathering the masses.”Now boys, I’d like some alone time, so return to your homes, jobs, and possibly your wives.”She chuckled at the last part.”Go on, I’ll probably take another vacation real soon!”She set her hand down, and they all reluctantly left.

“Back to tanning, this time, totally uninterrupted...”She rolled over onto her stomach, allowing her sleek back, full butt, and toned legs to get some sun as well. Unknown to her though, a small assembly of only four men remained, hiding out on one of her toenails.

“You...you sure this is safe?”One man asked nervously.”I mean...we shouldn’t even be here! She’ll kill us if she finds us!”

“She won’t find us. She’s too goddamned humongous to even properly see another human being.”The leader of the group replied by smacking the nervous man upside the head.”Now, we all know the plan, right?”

They all nodded fervently.”You all are each given a small, but extremely powerful explosive that you are to place at a designated location across this bitch’s body. Once we’ve all reported in, we set them off, and boom goes this bitch! She won’t ever mess with Spiraling Out of Control again!”

The remaining three men nodded in agreement, readying their devices. “Alright, I’ll get her foot. You three plant the others on her leg, butt, and back - I’m sure she’ll feel that last one for sure; 20 nuclear missiles really take a toll on a person’s body, and I’m sure she’s still in pain from it. Now, get to work!”

“Right!”

Taking off their tops, the men revealed handmade jet pack prototypes on their backs, allowing them to reach the targeted parts of the giantess’s body in a short period of time. Because they had observed her tanning ritual from the day before, the team knew that they would have plenty of time to execute the operation before Miss Spiral flipped onto her front. In the timespan of a few hours, each operative had planted their respective device on a skin cell on her body (her back taking longest to reach), specifically those connected to sensitive nerves that would increase the force of the explosion felt by her. Once all of them were affixed to her body, the group rendezvoused at the specified location, right off of the coast of where Miss Spiral lay.

“This is for what you did to our leader and our other comrades!” the leader of the group declared as he held the detonator in his hands. “You’ve gotten too big, bitch. You should’ve died LONG ago, you massive freak! Now face the wrath of Spiraling Out of Control!” With that, his finger pressed down on the detonation device, activating the explosives on the mega-mom’s body.
14222211111.title: The Adventures of Mega Miss Spiral, Pt.6

142222111111.content:
In a flash, the smoke, shrapnel, and brimstone that came with the explosions erupted across Miss Spiral, sending jolts of tremendous pain across her entire body. The bomb on her foot was directly connected to her achilles heel, nearly crippling her. The one on her posterior generated a massive blast, and the one located on her back was where a majority of the nuclear arms had gone off just the day before. With a sudden gasp of pain, waves upon waves of agonizing fire ripped through her body.”Not...again!”She gasped out, only for the unfamiliar hold of unconsciousness to overtake her.

“Mission accomplished.”The leader of the group grinned wickedly. He held up a phone.”The Big Bitch is down, I repeat, the Big Bitch is down.”He cackled as the men behind him high-fived at the deed they had just done. Though, the nervous man was very unsure of himself. They had just harmed, and possibly killed, another human being, despite how massive she was.

In a matter of minutes, it was being broadcasted all across the world. Miss Spiral, the living goddess, had been harmed once more, and was currently unreactive and unconscious.

Back at the Spiral home, Michael and Lily were sitting around, the former gaming and the latter watching her favorite television program in the opposite room.

“Hey, mind turning that down a bit?” Lily asked her brother. “I can’t hear my show!”

“And miss hearing what Ezio Auditore has to say? I don’t think so!” the elder brother replied.

“Ugh! I’m sooooo telling Mom next time we see her.”

Almost immediately after Lily had uttered those words, the television station she was watched had broke in to breaking news.

“Micheal! Get in here NOW!” she screamed.

“I told you, I’m not turning down Assassin’s Creed!”

“No! It’s Mom! She’s unconscious!”

“WHAT?!”

Michael immediately dropped his controller and rushed into the other room, both children looking on in fear of the sight of their giant, sexy mother unconscious and face-down in the Pacific Ocean.

“She’s...She’s gonna be alright...right?” Lily asked her brother.

“Y-Yeah, of course,” Michael nodded, a bit unsure himself. “I mean, this is Mom we’re talking about here.”

“Maybe she was right...Maybe she really wasn’t big enough yet...”

“Hey! Don’t start talking like that! She’s probably just fine!” he reassured her. “She brushed off a nuclear assault against her yesterday, right?”

“Yeah, but...but she was at least conscious then...”

------

“Uhh...boss?”The nervous man tugged at the leader’s sleeve, the four terrorists settling down for a victory beer. The larger and much more gruff man turned to the smaller one with a glare in his eye.”What is it?”He barked out, taking a deep swig of the drink.

“I was just wondering...don’t you think that what we just did was...bad?”

The leader paused, only to smack nervous across the face again.”What are you, in kindergarten?!”

“But boss...we probably just killed somebody...”

“Listen here you pussyfuck...”The leader yanked him up by his shirt collar.”That Big Bitch isn’t a ‘somebody’. She’s a giant monster, a catastrophe waiting to happen. For God’s sake, she picked up an entire continent and threw it off the planet! We just saved the world kid.”

“At the cost of a life...?”

“At the cost of a few explosives. You know how much it costs to make those things?!”The leader threw down nervous man with a deep, growling laughter, the other two joining suit in their drunken revelry. Nervous man stood up shakily, dusting himself off, turning to the still Miss Spiral in the distance, only for his eyes to widen.”Uhh....boss.”

“WHAT, you little fuck?!”

“She’s getting bigger.”
142222111111.title: The Adventures of Mega Miss Spiral, Pt.7

1422221111111.content:
[Sorry for accidentally deleting this, some issues with the computer~]

“Ha! Good one, you moron!”

“N-No, I’m not kidding this time...”

The leader growled angrily as he walked over to the man and grabbed him by his neck. “Now listen to me, you little shit, this isn’t funny anymore. Now shut up or die!”

“I-I-If you don’t believe me, go ahead and look for yourself.”

“Fine, but if she’s not, you’re totally dead!”

Staring at the incapacitated woman off the coast of Asia, the insane man’s eyes widened in shock as he viewed Miss Spiral’s body rising higher and higher, now larger than her previous 2500 mile height.

“Im...Impossible...”

-----

“L-Lily look!”

“Mom...She’s...She’s growing again!”

“She’s alright! See, I told you she’d be fine!”

“Yeah...but I just wonder how big she’ll be now...”

------

The entire planet watched as Miss Spiral’s unconscious form continued to enlarge, her body surpassing 2700 miles and quickly expanding. Those residents who lived on Asia’s eastern coast ran in fear as her full, enormous breasts began to grow towards the land, soon about to act as massive bulldozers of calamity to give the women more space to expand. Her growing form caused the waters around her to ripple outwards in every direction as well, causing small tidal waves to head towards Japan and the western coast of the United States, though the latter’s waves would break apart before ever making landfall.

“That...that BITCH!” the leader growled in frustration. “No matter what we do, she just keeps getting bigger! Gah! Next time, we don’t leave her alive! We go all-out, making sure we kill her no matter what!”

“Um, b-boss...” a henchman began.

“What is it now?!”

“L-Look...”

As her body neared 3000 miles in height, the titanic beauty’s body began to stir, gently waking from her unconscious state...and still growing...

“Oh my...what...what happened?”Miss Spiral said groggily. She had never experienced being unconscious before, and the feeling left her quite unnerved. As she slowly rose, the world watched on in a mixture of awe, terror, and wonder. In another display of size, she had upgrade an extra set of size, now a whopping 3500 miles tall.
