She looked around as if she was confused, the tiny landscape now even smaller from her heightened vantage point.”It looks like little ol’ me got a bit bigger...again....”She giggled, stretching her full body towards the heavens, flexing and posing for all of the millions of micro tinies looking at her.

“I don’t fucking believe it...”The leader griped.”She’s not even hurt! She just shrugged off bombs attached to her fucking nervous system!”

“C’mon you mopes...”He waved, his other three lackeys following.”We gotta report back with the rest of the group...”

The nervous man sighed with relief knowing that she was still alive, but was also simultaneously filled with dread knowing that the group’s motivations had finally reached their ultimate goal: The complete and utter annihilation of the 3500 mile mother.

“Wow, I certainly must be getting from the growth fairy pretty often. I think I’ve doubled in size over the past day...Well, you know what they say, bigger is better!” Miss Spiral smiled to herself, proudly stomping the ground below to get a feel of her new size, the monumental mother now larger than the USA was wide. Turning back towards the Asian continent, she waved happily at her billions of fans. “Thanks for the great day everyone! Hope you didn’t mind my little growth spurt. I’m definitely gonna take my next vacation here for sure. Bye~”

Knowing she had to report for measuring and testing once again, the titaness began to hum a tune to herself as she made her return trip, now taking only three earthshaking steps to complete rather than the five she took earlier. Reaching the spot in the ocean she had sat in the day before, Miss Spiral gently sat down and extended her palm, waiting for the scientists to arrive.

But come they did not. She had sat there and waited a good thirty minutes, only for the alarms inside her head to go off. Something was definitely wrong, and she could feel it this time. Standing back up, she turned to look at the US, almost a mid-sized carpet she could walk across if she wanted to, but that would be terrifyingly wrong, billions of people and cities crushed underfoot. She shuddered at the thought, especially if her two babies were to be in her path.”Dr. Connors? Tiny government men? Hello-o-o, I’m ready for my check-up!”She spoke, knowing full well they could hear her, everybody across the planet could.

“Hellllllllllllllloooooo-ooooo!” she called out again. “Anyone at all down there?”

Something inside of her, most likely her mother’s intuition, told her something was amiss. Normally, the government scientists would have arrived by now and her test would be over, but for some reason, their absence worried the titanic woman. Ever the optimist, she continued to hope her intuition was wrong.

“Umm...Should I just come to you guys this time?” she asked. “Or if you need me to lay down, I can always do that. Just let me know!”

After another five minutes of waiting, she still didn’t receive any reply. Now unsure of what to do, Miss Spiral decided to talk with the two humans who would always talk with her: Her children.

“Micheal, Lily, come out of the house, Mommy’s coming home for a quick visit!”She took only one small step this time, and her hometown was right by her feet.”Oh my, it looks like this place gets smaller and smaller everytime I visit...”She giggled, only for a very, very small thing to pique her interest. A helicopter was circling around her toes. Probably a news media copter. With a heavy sigh, the monolithic Mom knew she would have to speak with them sooner or later, might as well be sooner. She just hoped her babies wouldn’t mind. Reaching down, she plucked the tiny thing right out of mid-air with her fingernail, raising it up to her eye for a good look of the micro mites occupying it.”What is it that you want?”She asked, sounding almost irritated. Very few things made her upset, but one sure thing did: The media. They always asked the dumbest questions and assumed the worst things, especially with her.

A small woman stepped out of the copter with a camera man behind her.”May we get a few words from the living goddess herself about the events over the past few days?”

“A few words? Sure: I got even bigger,” she answered succinctly, obviously annoyed by the local news team. “Is that all?”

“Well, mind if we just ask you a few more questions?” the interviewer asked.

“Just make it quick,” she responded, her voice slightly angry.

“Alright. Well then, what do you have to say about getting rid of Africa yesterday? Don’t you think that was a bit extreme?

“They nuked me...Have you even been hit with nuclear missiles before?” the gigantic woman asked, her annoyance reaching critical levels due to another of the media’s dumb questions. “I made them pay for what they did to me, simple as that. Can we hurry this up please? I need to see my kids.”

“What about Spiraling Out of Control? What do you think about their attack on you today? Lastly, why do you think you’ve grown over two times your size in only two days time? Do you think all of humanity is doomed to fall against your growing body?”

With a sigh, the titanic being rolled her eyes.”Okay, all in that order: I believe they’re a terrorist group, attacking me for no good reason just because I exist, and their ‘attack’ on me backfired, it just made me harder to kill. And, I like being this big, I really do, and to be honest, I have absolutely no idea why I’ve grown like this, ask some scientists around, they’ve plotted out a chart that maps my growth.”She paused as she considered the last question, she had heard it many times before, and it always unsettled her. Early on in her growing stages, one scientist had come up to her and told her bluntly that it was a very likely outcome that she could become big enough to destroy the world if she wanted to. She thought the idea silly at the time, as she was only around 30ft. tall back in her 20s, but now with all of the activity recently, the prospect was becoming more and more likely.”I believe...that I would never harm anyone of this earth, at least not intentionally. Earth is safe as long as I am around.”

“What about-”

“That’s enough questions for now.”

“But we’re just getting to the juicy parts, ma'am! The viewers out there want to know the truth!”

“You want to know the truth? The truth is I’m going to settle your itty-bitty selves back down on the ground and you’re not going to bother me again. I need to speak with my kids.”With that, the interview was over, she crouched down and deposited the copter, woman, and her cameraman right on the outskirts of town, a good 20 miles from any means of contact.

With that done, she turned back to the neighborhood where she had once lived, her eyes focusing in on a small, small homestead with two barely-visible specks waving at her.
1422221111111.title: The Adventures of Mega Miss Spiral, Pt.8

14222211111111.content:
“Moooooom!” the two called up to their parent, happy to see she was back to her usual kind, yet zany, self.

“Oh, my darling little angels!” Miss Spiral cooed as her annoyance at the local media was quickly replaced with the love she had for the most precious things on the planet to her. “Notice anything different about me, kids?” she giggled, teasing the two smaller beings as her godlike laughter resounded through the town.

“Um...You got even bigger?” Lily answered cautiously.

“Yep, you sure got it! That’s my little honor student!” the gargantuan mother smiled down proudly.

“You look refreshed too, Mom,” Michael answered.

“And also correct! You two are such smart little guys! I’m so lucky to have such wonderful children!” Miss Spiral smiled warmly, glad to be with her family once again. “I had the nicest little massage today, so I feel absolutely great. And can you believe I got it for free? What an amazing deal!”

“Yeah, I can believe it...” Lily sighed. “So Mom, how much did you grow this time?”

“Oh, just another little one like yesterday. I’m still getting bigger all the time!”

“Did...Did she just say 1000 miles was little?!” Michael said, in awe of how his mother thought of her recent size upgrades.

“Told you she would.”

“Anyways, hop on kids, I need to talk to you two for a moment about something important...or if you like staring at my pampered toes, I can just talk to you from here,” she said optimistically as she gently tapped her toes against the ground, causing the entire town to shake.

“I think we’d be safer on your finger, Mom...”Michael said cautiously.

“Sure thing, kiddos!”She grinned, reaching down with an extended forefinger, her two favorite minute people climbing onto it. Bringing her finger gently up, she began.”Now kids, did any government men come by today?”

“No, not at all. Just the usual paparazzi trying to get us to answer questions about you.”Lily replied, sitting herself down on one of the fingerprint lines thick enough to hold a city upon.

“Don’t forget the pervs,”Michael added, sitting down beside his sibling.”You have no idea how of those guys come around asking if we can get ‘em a talk with you.”

“So...no government men? No scientists? Nobody?”

They both shrugged.”Sorry mom...”

----

Meanwhile

“Gentlemen,”

A large warehouse with over a hundred people gathered within lighted up to reveal a stage, and upon that stage, Dr. Connors, the Leader, and the Nervous Man all three stood.”We welcome you to this week’s Anti-Spiraler meeting!”

“She’s Spiraling Out of Control! Eventually, we’ll all be sucked in!”The building rang with their greeting and mantra.

“Everyone, this is Dr. Connors,”The Leader pointed at the frail man in a stark white labcoat.

“He’s been working with the Big Bitch ever since she started growing, way back from the beginning, and as you know,”

“I’ve been a secret member of your little club as well.”Dr. Connors stepped forward, cutting the leader off.”I can speak for myself, thank you.”He adjust the collar of his coat before continuing.”Now, I bet you’re all wondering why I’m here today. It’s very simple. Over the past decade or so, I’ve been gathering data and samples of Miss Spiral, she and our silly government think it’s to keep track of her health. Not so, in fact, I’ve actually found the means of her growth. A very random, and very volatile super-mutagen, a one in a trillion chance of ever occurring within the human gene pool. Unfortunately, it happened with her. But, I do have a solution,”He reached into a pocket and pulled out a small vial with an odd, glowing liquid inside.”This fluorescent little concoction is the cure to all of our problems!”

“What...what’ll do?”The Nervous Man questioned slowly.

“Rapid cellular degeneration, my good man!”

“.....What?”

“It will make her smaller.”

“How much we talking ‘bout here, Doc?”The Leader looked at the vial quzzically.

“I’m very sure that it will indeed reduce her back down the size of a normal human being...with a few side effects like paranoid mental stability, blindness, and possibly cancer. But it’ll work, I guarantee it!”

“That’s great! All we gotta do is inject her with the stuff-”

“Not very likely.”

“What do ya mean?”

Dr. Connors pulled a very bland expression in reply, raising one eyebrow.”The woman can shrug off a nuclear missile, sir. I doubt a simple human-sized needle would puncture her skin.”

“Then how do we get it in her?!”

“Very simple: One man will have to approach her while she rests and deposit it into her mouth. From there,”He held out his arms.”We are victorious!”

“I’ll volunteer for it,” the leader said. “I want the satisfaction of bringing the Big Bitch down myself.”

“Then so be it! Tomorrow, she shall be bigger no more! Meeting adjourned!”

---------------

“Well then, I’ll be off for the night! Sleep well kids!” Miss Spiral bid farewell to her children as she headed back towards the Atlantic Ocean to rest.

“Night Mom!” the two shouted as they watched their titanic mother walk off into the distance.

As she lay down in the now smaller ocean, she began to ponder the day’s events as she drifted off to sleep. “Ah, another wonderful day with my wonderful angels. I simply can’t wait until tomorrow...”

As the living goddess fell asleep, the instigator from earlier in the day arrived in front of her mouth via jet, potion in hand. “And now, it’s time to shrink, you overgrown freak!” With that, he poured the vial’s entire contents into her mouth, watching as they became absorbed into her system before leaving.

No one knew what the potion’s true effects would be. Only time would tell if the monolithic mother would indeed return to a mortal size, despite her love of growth and her massive height.
14222211111111.title: The Adventures of Mega Miss Spiral, Pt.9

142222111111111.content:
“Uhh...sir...”

Dr. Connors had just returned to his lab, a small outpost in D.C., right after it was confirmed from his fellow Anti-Spiraler that the vial had been dumped into Miss Spiral’s mouth. The building had a staff of over a hundred men, all running tests, data streams, and news regarding the giant woman.

The scientist turned to see one of his underlings sitting at a desk, his eyes wide as he gazed at a computer screen.

“What is it?”Connors asked as he approached.

“Sir, we’re getting a live feed of this right now via satellite...”He turned and tapped on a microphone, his voice being broadcasted all across the world to major news stations.”This is the Spiral Observation Station #2. I have news regarding Ellen Spiral. This is live video people...She’s getting bigger. Again. Estimated height, unknown. Estimated time of growth, unknown. This is an emergency, report to your local disaster shelters immediately.”

Dr. Connors paled in the face at the sight on the video.”And I had all the confidence in the world that it would work...”he whispered to himself.

“You did the best you could sir,” a fellow researcher said to him, attempting to relieve him of his terrible mood.

“My best wasn’t good enough,” Dr. Connors replied. “That potion was our last hope of stopping her. For 12 whole years, 12 whole years! I’ve been monitoring her all that time, ever since she was only a small 8 ft tall freak! I was going to stop her, I had all the data to stop her, my formula was designed specifically for her finally shrink! How...How the hell did she grow from it?!”

“I’m sure we can still stop her. We can’t give up!”

The doctor sighed for a moment before recomposing himself. “You’re right, but since this failed, she’s now truly Spiraling Out of Control...For all we know, we may have just accidentally given birth to a goddess. We’ll all be sucked in...into the overgrown Ellen Spiral...”

“S-Sir?”

“Don’t worry, I won’t give up. I’ll make one last potion and give it to her myself. This time, I’ll make it as potent as I can. I don’t care if it kills her, we have to succeed no matter what the cost. She has to shrink! It’s time to stop Ellen Spiral, once and for all!”

Coming up with a quick plan as to how to deliver his new potion, Dr.Connors sent out a radio message to group members across the globe.

“Attention Anti-Spiralers: Our best efforts have failed; the target is now over 4000 miles and is still expanding...and this time, I don’t think it’ll just be a 1000 mile jump. Ellen Spiral, known to many of you as the Big Bitch or the Fucking Freak, has finally begun to spiral out of control. If we allow her to continue any further, she may bring about the destruction of Earth as we know it. Tonight, I shall craft one last potion to shrink her back to normal, but tomorrow, I’m ordering an all-out assault on this massive woman we all hate so much. She may have survived a nuclear strike, but remember, no matter how big she may be, she’s still only human - she can still feel pain and die. We cannot let the history books say that humanity allowed itself to give birth to a goddess; we must make our last stand and take her down once and for all. Hit her with every available weapon we have, even the experimental Anti-Spiral weapons we’ve saved for just such an occasion.

“...She’s spiraling out of control...Eventually, we’ll all be sucked in...Ellen Spiral must die...”

------------

The world continued to watch onwards to their television sets, computers, or even the sky itself as Miss Spiral escalated higher and higher in height, her form still sleeping rather peacefully despite all of this. Michael and Lily were up late into the night, tracking her progress with the rest of the globe as she just seemed to get bigger and bigger in a slow yet steady rate of growth.

She did not stop until early morn, just as the sun’s rays began to shed its light upon America and Miss Spiral herself.

“This is the Spiral Observation Station #2,”The voice sounded tired as he had been up the entire time, watching the screen of the beautiful mom just become more and more godlike in stature.

“And, it is reported her growth has stopped, I repeat, Ellen Spiral’s growth has stopped at 7500....miles tall....”He gasped out the unfathomably large number just as she yawned and began to wake.

”What a beautiful new day...”She fluttered her eyes open.”But why...why do I feel so funny this morning...?”

Miss Spiral slowly stood up to her full height, her large chest jiggling slightly as she watched in awe, realizing how much her view of the world had changed overnight. Whereas before it would take her several steps to travel across her home country, she now estimated that she could reach the other side of it in a single step.

“I...I grew...I grew!” she cheered, absolutely loving and embracing her new height with a truly godlike thundering laughter that could be heard across the solar system. As she shifted her weight slightly, the planet buckled beneath her immense weight, recognizing her presence as one of a being that could rival the planet itself. “This’ll make waking up everyone else a breeze now!”

“This is Spiral Observation #2! The titaness is about to move! Have the whole planet brace for impact!”

“Good morning everyone! It’s time to wake up to another wonderful day!” Miss Spiral whispered as she raised her left foot into the air and began to gently drop it back to the same place on the ground, knowing full well she would only need a gentle stomp to achieve her wake-up effect.

She gently lowered her foot to the ground, sending powerful vibrations all across the globe. Immediately, those who had not fallen asleep while watching her were surely awake now.”Look at me everybody!”She giggled.”Look how big I’ve gotten! There’s so much more to do now!”

---

Dr. Connors worked furiously in his lab, the incessant thunder and noise generated by Miss Spiral his fuel to create the potion even faster. He held up a phone to signal to the battalions of Anti-Spiralers readying for combat.”Begin assault against the Big Bitch. Take her down...”

From every country across the world, at least a dozen fighter jets took to the skies to begin battle with the massive mom. Ships set to sea, armed with heavy artillery cannons and thousands of men readied with guns. Their secret Anti-Spiraler weapons, powerful lasers and prototype explosives, were also packed into the arsenal. All the while, the oblivious giantess tapped her chin with her finger, considering what to do today...

“Let’s see...What to do, what to do...” she pondered. “I took a day off yesterday, so I should definitely do something fun today. Oh! Maybe I can finally go on that world tour run? But then again, I don’t want to hurt anyone...Oh, I know! I’ll make an Earth-angel! Or maybe...Yes, I’ll go and measure myself again. Hopefully that nice little wall is still there,” Miss Spiral smiled as she gently tapped her toes to a happy tune.

Before she could take her next step, the members of Spiraling Out of Control made their move, beginning their attack on the overwhelming titaness. With her toes over 100 miles each, each vehicle locked on to a massive digit, dumping all of their ammunition on her smooth flesh. With the use of their Anti-Spiral lasers, Miss Spiral could actually begin to feel a pain emanating from her feet, the intensity slowly beginning to grow stronger.

“Ouch! What’s going on down there?” she asked herself, gazing down at her toes so far below.
142222111111111.title: The Adventures of Mega Miss Spiral, Pt.10

1422221111111111.content:
Her eyes expressed a mixture of confusion and concern at the sight of countless specks zooming around her toes, fires and explosions going off now and again against the skin.”I slept so good...and I wake up to this mess?”She shook her head, cringing a bit at the sensation of sudden pain shooting across her digits.”I’m guessing you mites are with Spiraling Out of Control?”She guessed as she raised her right big toe and slammed it down in quick succession, instantly obliterating a large number of her attackers. Yet, she had to admire their persistence. The others did not flee in terror like they should have at the sight of a hundred mile-sized toe crash into the ocean. With a sigh, Miss Spiral went to work with dealing with the tiny nuisances, slowly raising each of her toes and bringing them back down, destroying enemies with every boom of toe meeting earth.

Unfortunately, the braver pilots who risked flying higher took the advantage. With their lasers blasting at her ankles, Miss Spiral felt them give way and herself falling to her knees, giving her tiny foes chance to blast away at her upper body now.”Pfft...shoo...go away!”She swatted at the mites buzzing around her with annoying and very painful accuracy of their lasers and missiles.

As she dropped to her knees, reporters from around the world began to pick up on this developing story, broadcasting live the final battle between the resistance movement and the largest woman to ever exist. Many people rooted for Miss Spiral; though she was big, she was incredibly kind as well, making sure not to hurt anyone intentionally. However, an equally large number of humans began to side with the Anti-Spiralers, believing that she had finally grown too large to be left alive; they believed that her body would eventually outgrow the planet and that she had to be taken down before then. Miss Spiral’s own children watched the epic brawl from their television at home, rooting on their mother with all their being.

“C’mon Mom, you can do it! I know you can!” Michael cheered on.

“Yeah Mom, with your size, you can do anything!” Lily added. “Just put that size of yours to good use!”

The two of them looked at each other and nodded, knowing the perfect cheer to say: “Grow Mom! Grow, Grow, Grow!”

Meanwhile, Miss Spiral’s anger was starting to build as the assault continued, a rare occasion for the usually cool-headed woman. “Now you guys are starting to get almost as annoying as those pesky media guys. Please just stop already!” she exclaimed as she swiped her hand across her upper body, taking out a few planes yet damaging that area in the process by exposing herself to more fire.

“Keep it up, we’ve almost got her,” Dr. Connors commanded. “Prepare the special bomb filled with the formula; make sure she ingests it...She WILL shrink and die....”

“Copy that, sir.”The jet with the formula bomb reported in, flying around at a safe distance away from the main fight, looking for the perfect time for his comrades to open up a way directly to Miss Spiral’s open mouth. All he had to do was play the waiting game.

Miss Spiral proved to be quite the capable and inventive combatant against the pitifully tiny forces. She would actually catch some of the specks in midair and crush them with her nails,or actually give her hair a little flip and allow her brown locks to catch planes in them and let them crash on the strands. But all in all, it seemed to be a standstill battle, she would crush dozens, only for countless more to take their place, constantly firing at her legs to make sure she wouldn’t stand up and keep her height advantage, many flying around her face now.”I’m getting really tired of you all!”She griped, quickly finding a solution to be rid of the swarm around her face. She began to suck in. A torrent of powerful wind began finding the specks, sucking the jets in like a vacuum into the fathomless maw of her luscious lips and into her mouth to be destroyed by her tongue and teeth.

“I’m taking the shot, over. The Big Bitch is going down.”The main jet rapidly accelerated towards her mouth, easily being sucked into tunnel of air like the others. Except this time, he released a small bomb into her mouth, the device exploding upon contact with her tongue.

At once she stopped, gagging at the sudden taste spreading across her mouth.”Oh my, that is nasty! Blech!”

“Tango 1, report in,” Dr. Connors ordered. “What is the status of the medicine?”

“Roger that, Eagle 1,” the pilot answered. “It’s a hit, the Big Bitch has taken her meds. She said it tastes like crap.”

“Yes, it should; means that it’s having a positive reaction to her body,” the doctor sighed in relief. “Alright, it should take a minute or two for it to take effect, so keep her occupied until then.” He then switched back to massive radio communications. “All units, report! This is it, our final moment. Just keep up the attack for another few minutes and the Spiral will no longer be a threat. We can do this! Don’t let up!”

Renewed by the fact that the potion had been ingested, the rebels amped up their efforts, firing every last blast they could muster at her massive form. Miss Spiral, on the other hand, was too busy with getting rid of the awful taste in her mouth to properly counterattack.

“Yucky! I wonder what I ate?” she asked as she let out a small burp. “Whoops! Excuse me! I wonder if it was all those itty bitty planes?”

After another minute of battling the titaness, the Anti-Spiralers managed to land a direct hit on her stomach, causing Miss Spiral to fall over and land on her breasts, taking out most of the naval units in the process. With her body lower to the ground, the teams began to focus on her back, hoping to take advantage of her injuries there from the previous days. As she yelped out in pain, Miss Spiral quickly regained her stance on her knees once again, now more annoyed than ever.

“Alright, now I’m done playing nice!” she proclaimed. However, before she could vent her anger, Miss Spiral clutched her stomach, feeling it begin to gurgle. “What’s going on?”

“Spiral Observation Station #1, get ready to analyze the target!” Dr. Connor commanded. “It’s time to watch the beginning of the end.”

As her stomach began to settle down, Miss Spiral felt a strange, warm sensation travel throughout her body. It was the moment of truth: Did the formula finally work?
1422221111111111.title: The Adventures of Mega Miss Spiral, Pt.11

choices: She has to leave to protect earth.
Time to become an evil goddess...
14222211111111111.content:
A moment of silence stretched out for the longest time. The fighters retreated to a reasonable distance, still at the ready whenever Miss Spiral would shrink to apprehend her once she was normal sized.

“I feel...”Miss Spiral spoke cautiously, her mouth still reeking of the taste from the formula bomb. She slowly stood up, glad her attackers had left, but her stomach still gurgled, the only sound heard for miles. The earth held it’s breath in anticipation at what would come next.

“....Strange...”She finished her sentence with a hiccup. All at once, everything went to shit for the Anti-Spiralers.

Dr. Connors could not believe what he was seeing, slack-jawed and wide eyed.

The remainder of the Anti-Spiral forces retreated in fear.

The populace of the world gazed up in awe as Miss Spiral began to grow once again.

At first, it was slow, but rapidly beginning to pick up pace. In a matter of seconds, 7500 miles was just a memory as she entered 8000 miles and continued to shoot up into the atmosphere.”Oh my....oh my!”Even Miss Spiral found her size increase dizzying. Her rapidly expanding feet was quickly approaching the US’s coastline, and she had to take a few steps back just to make sure her toes didn’t reach land and destroy whatever laid there. But with her persistant growth, she quickly found that she was running out of safe ocean to stand on.

“Everybody! Quickly, retreat to your nearest disaster shelter! I repeat, RETREAT!”Warning signals flashed across the globe as billions panicked and fled to whatever safety they could find. School gyms were immediately crowded, underground fallout shelters took people quickly, and streets were packed with traffic with people fleeing with homes of outrunning the gargantuan woman quickly encompassing the entire western hemisphere.

Slowly, ever so slowly, her growth died down. After five minutes packed with solid size escalation, Miss Spiral was now a towering, intimidating, and frightening 10,000 miles tall, taking up the view of almost the entire planet.One country could gaze at her titanic toes, while on the other side of the globe countries were meeting the back of her heel.

“I...I got bigger...”She whispered, still thunderous roars in the ears of all below. She would usually be happy, but after the events of the recent days, she began to ponder something. How had she grown? Every time she was attacked. She was peaceful, she was kind, and yet people still feared her, still hated her, still wanted her destroyed. Now, the gigantic being had a decision to make. She knew that her presence on earth was dangerous to the entire human race. One wrong twitch, and bye-bye went a civilization. One wrong step, and she’d shatter the planet. She would have to leave to protect the ones she loved. Or...

Or, she could enact her revenge. The thought came across her mind vile, but disgustingly appealing at the same time. She could rule this world if she wanted to, hell, she always could have right from day one of being a giantess. She could become a fearful and terrifying goddess, mighty in her wrath towards all that had wronged her. It actually reviled her that she was CONSIDERING such an evil thought.

But as she gazed down at the countries laid out before her with their countless mortals staring up at her, waiting for a decision, the enormous Ellen Spiral finally made up her mind.
14222211111111111.title: The Adventures of Mega Miss Spiral, pt.12

142222111111111111.content:
“I...I understand now...” she whispered. “I love my size, I absolutely do, but because of what’s been happening the past few days, I know that I can’t stay on Earth anymore. I don’t want to hurt anyone else, so I’ll save everyone the trouble and leave the Earth in peace. I’m still getting bigger, so I think it’d be for the best...though I wouldn’t mind finally getting some clothes again!” Miss Spiral giggled.

The people of Earth let out a collective sigh of relief as the immeasurable woman decided she’d leave the planet to stop all of this senseless fighting. Despite the war they had waged against her all these years, even Dr. Connors felt sorry for the huge mother, sad that he could not finally return her to normal despite her constant protests. However, because of this, he swore to himself to focus his research on the Infinite Spiral project, determined to make some clothes that would grow along with her no matter how big she became.

“Bye everyone...especially to my two precious babies...I’ll miss you all.”With that, she bent a little at the knees and sprang up, rocketing herself into space with her considerable strength. Miss Spiral floated around earth for the longest time, simply gazing at it and admiring the tiny planet she had once lived on.”It’s so very pretty...”She cooed, a smile on her face yet tears in her eyes. The massive mother turned around and began floating away.

“Goodbye everyone...” she smiled once more as she gazed out into the vast star ocean of the cosmos. “Don’t worry, I’ll come back to visit you all someday...Who knows, I might just be able to fit just my toe on the planet for a little toe-cation!” Miss Spiral giggled as she continued to float off into the endless void of space.

“Now then, what fun can I have out here in space,” she pondered. Before she could continue, the monumental mother felt a chill encompassing her naked body, one of the first she had felt in a long time. “Brrr! It sure is chilly in space! If I had known that, I would’ve brought an itty bitty jacket! Now let’s see...Oh, I know! I’ll help out those tiny scientists on Earth by checking on Mars! I wonder if there really are such things as aliens? Oh well, I bet they’ll have never seen something as big as me before!”

Turning her attention towards a small red dot countless miles off in the distance, Miss Spiral began to head towards her new destination, still thinking of how to help the people of Earth no matter how big she became and despite her voluntary exile.

She began floating over towards the mars, unknown of the journey ahead. With the red planet so far away, 250 million miles to be exact, she had plenty of time to think as she traveled, and plenty of time for the denizens of earth to recover from the destruction she had brought.

-----

Several Months Later

“Ah, now this is more like it...”

Miss Spiral was in her usual tanning position upon Mars, the titanic, 10,000 mile tall being finding the desolate world perfect for her to live on. Sure, it was small, and she could traverse it in a few minute’s time, but no living being would ever be harmed by her, and she hadn’t been attacked by aliens, so that was a plus as well. It had been almost half a year since she left behind the home she once knew, and she knew nothing of what was going on over on her home world. She would like to look up at it in the sky every once in a while, just gazing at it for hours on end, enjoying it’s blue color and lazy revolving. She could sometimes see the marks she had left, the hole where Africa had once been, an imprint of her once smaller body laying down, footprints, stuff like that.

And she missed it all so deathly much.

Miss Spiral happily sighed, “I miss the Earth, I really do. I wonder what’s been happening down there after all this time?” she pondered as she flipped onto her stomach, letting the Sun begin to tan the other side of her luscious body. Due to the effects of the potions she had ingested, Miss Spiral’s body dynamics had become fundamentally altered: She no longer needed to sleep, yet she did only to remember what is was like to do so; her body had stopped aging - she would now be eternally youthful and immortal; and all of her senses had become heightened to superhuman levels. She was basically now a living goddess.

“I hope everyone’s doing fine down there without me...” she paused for a moment before continuing. “Tomorrow’s Lily’s birthday...and I won’t be there to share it with my darling little angel...” Gathering herself once more, Miss Spiral quickly had a bright idea come to mind. “Oh! Wait! That’s perfect! I might not be there in person, but I sure can give her the best birthday present ever!” she giggled as she resumed her tan, deciding to create her gift once she had pampered herself enough for the day.

The Next Day, That Very Night

“Are you sure I can’t open my eyes yet?”

“Just keep the friggin’ blindfold on, Lily.”Michael sighed as he, his younger sibling, and several other party-goers sat on their front lawn, looking up towards the night sky in anticipation.

“Mom’ll have your birthday present soon.”

“How can you possibly know?”

“NASA’s keepin’ tabs on mom now that she’s in their field of expertise, space. And they sent me a message just this morning about a gift from her, to you...”

“Now...?”

“No...”Michael looked at his wristwatch, waiting for the exact time Miss Spiral had given in the message, midnight. One minute away. 45 seconds...30...10....3,2,1...

“Okay, now.”

Lily removed the blindfold covering her face to see her older brother smiling down at her and handing her a telescope. She took it in hand, held it up to her eye, and followed where Michael’s finger pointed to the stars above. It took her to Mars. She saw her giant mother on the surface of the red planet waving at her in the telescope’s eye, and by her feet, etched into the earth itself, it read:

“I love you Lily, happy birthday baby. Mommy misses you all so much.”
142222111111111111.title: Leaving Earth

1422221111111111111.content:
Lily paused for a moment as tears began to fall from her eyes.

“L-Lily? You alright?” Michael asked as she hugged his sister.

“Yeah, I...I’m fine,” she replied as she dried her tears. “This is the best birthday present ever, and now whenever I look up at Mars, I’ll always be able to see how much Mom loves the two of us, even though she’s so far away from us.”

“Heh, Mom really outdid herself this time,” he smiled. “Don’t worry sis, I miss her too. I miss her more than anything. It’s just not the same without Mom on Earth, but at least she remembered your birthday.”

“I really miss her...I miss Mom!” Lily cried once again.

“There there...Hey, wanna know a secret?” he brother smiled. “Don’t tell her or I’ll deny it, alright?”

“Sure, what is it?”

“I...I miss the smell of Mom’s feet. Every day knowing that she was near by that familiar smell in the air. It was one of the advantages of having an ever-growing mother, you know?”

“Heh, I’m totally telling everyone,” she chuckled as her eyes cleared up.

“No fair!”

“Just kidding! Anyways, thanks Mom...Thank you so much. This was the best birthday ever.”

----

Miss Spiral grinned as she laid down on the red ground, staring up at earth, just like she knew her children were staring back at her. It made her warm, it made her feel almost...human. She liked that feeling.

“Goodnight, my babies!”She waved as she closed her eyes to sleep, knowing full well that she would not dream. Ever since her body’s chemical make up changed, whenever she forced her self to rest, she did not sleep, only saw blackness, and when she awoke, she would feel just fine. Not tired, not anything. Just big and happy.

She slowly drifted off to a snooze, her snores and soft breathing echoing throughout the solar system. But as she rested, a small shuttle blasted off from earth, it’s destination, Mars. The ship carried only a crew of three men, but these men were important. Dr. Connors, the Leader, and the Nervous Man, each one playing pivotal roles in the story of the gigantic goddess.”So Doc....why are we doing this again?”The Leader asked, feeling incredibly uncomfortable in his space suit.

“To inform Ellen Spiral of the happenings of earth and what involves her.”

“And we’re coming along because....”

“To apologize to her.”

“WHAT?!”

“It’s the right thing to do.”Connors placidly looked out the window, the shuttle rocketing them closer and closer to the red planet.”We’ve wronged this woman so much...we must make amends if we are to ever be at peace.”

“That’s your problem bub, I’m getting off this thing!”He unstrapped himself from his seat and began floating towards the emergency escape pod.

“If you want to helplessly float through the soul-sucking void of space, be my guest.”

“....”

He returned to his seat without question, strapping in quietly.

“D-do you t-t-think...she’ll forgive u-us?”The Nervous Man questioned, his voice stuttering and meek.

“I’m sure of it.”Connors nodded.”I worked on the woman for twelve years. She’s prone to her moments, yes, but she’ll never hold a grudge.”

“Hope you’re right....”Leader mumbled to himself.
1422221111111111111.title: To the Stars

14222211111111111111.content:
[This marks this interactive's 100th chapter! Woo! Thanks everybody!]

“I know I am. Now, I suggest you buckle up...It’s gonna be a bumpy ride.”

The vessel continued to veer towards Mars, arriving only a day later; due to the latest interspace technology and Mars’ proximity to Earth in its orbit, the journey’s travel time was minimized to the utmost. Upon landing towards the mammoth woman’s head, the three men donned their space suits and oxygen tanks before heading onto the planet’s surface.

“Hey, how come she doesn’t need to breathe here?” the former head of the Anti-Spirals groaned.

“I’ve already explained this to you several times,” Dr. Connors sighed. “Her entire body chemistry has been altered; she’s human yet inhuman at the same time.”

“Damn f-”

“Hey! Remember we said we’d stop calling her that!” the nervous man scolded. “We’re here to apologize, all of us.”

“Grrr...Fine. Just how do we wake her already? Let’s just get this over with.”

“Well, according to my calculations, Ellen should be awakening from her current rest period any moment now,” the doctor explained. “We just have to be patient.”

Just as predicted, exactly three minutes later, Miss Spiral slowly began to stir as she opened her eyes to another day alone. “Ah! It’s another big wonderful day!” she giggled to herself.

Upon waking up, her eyes roved over the red landscape, a very odd and peculiar sighting before her on the ground far below. She spotted it out in a heartbeat, a bright, chrome rocketship that glinted in the sunlight, a welcome break in the tedium of living alone for so long. And to the giant woman’s joy and surprise, tiny, tiny dots, three of them, waving at her.

Having no human contact for six months left her a little shaky as she lowered her finger towards them, the appendage quivering slightly. She was about to speak with someone. The excitement inside was about to burst out, but she had to contain it for the safety of the little ones on the tip of her finger, which she raised to her eye to greet.

“Hello all!”

“Miss Spiral, glad to see you’re in tip-top shape.”One of the microscopic mites spoke through an amplification piece in his suit.

“Dr. Connors? it’s been so long! How’ve you been?! And who are your friends?”

“I’ve been...trying my dear woman, trying. And my companions are Rick,”He pointed at leader.”And Dudley here.”A hand gestured towards the nervous man.

“And...we’ve come to give you some good news...and to apologize.”

“Apologize for what?”

“To apologize for all we put you through on Earth. We forced you to leave everything behind and made you what you are now, and for that, we are truly, truly sorry.”

“What do you mean, Dr. Connors?” she asked. “I always enjoyed your little tests.”

“Well...besides that, I was secretly working with Spiraling Out of Control in the latter stages of your life on Earth. Remember those last powerful bursts you experienced? Those were the result of my experiments on you...”

“W-What?!” Miss Spiral said as her eyes widened.

“I had honest intentions though, I can assure you of that,” he continued. “The potions were supposed to cause rapid cellular degeneration in your body, thus causing you to shrink. I was only trying to help both you and everyone on the planet...”

“Dr. Connors...it’s perfectly alright. In fact, I’m actually going to thank you for giving me such a nice size boost!” she smiled. “I’ve never been happier!”

“But I forced you to leave the planet...”

“Well, sure, but I could never give up my size. I love being big just as much as I love my little darlings...actually, probably a whole lot more!”

“That...that is greatly reassuring. Thank you, Ellen.”Dr. Connors gave a little bow and flourish of his hand.”Now, my companions wish to tell you something as well...”

Dudley, the nervous man, stepped forward, shaking violently in his space suit, staring up at the beautiful, giant face lovingly gazing back down at him.”H-hello...”

“Dearie, you’re shaking to death! Are you cold?”

“N-n-no....I....”He tapped his helmet to make sure his microphone piece was working properly.”I...just wanted to apologize t-t-too....I’m a-a-a member of....w-was a member of Spiraling Out of Control....a....and I helped with bombing you....”He cringed at the words.”And my friend here...Rick...he was the leader after you stomped on Frederick...he would like to say he’s sorry t-t-too...”He elbowed the man beside him, who perked up immediately and looked up at the giant woman with distaste.

“Yeah....whatever he said. I’m sorry.”Rick mumbled with crossed arms.

“H-Hey, say it like you m-mean it!” his comrade prodded him. “You promised!”

“Ugh, fiiiine!” the ex-leader gave in. “I’m...sorry for attacking you like we did. It was wrong of us to do that to you. You weren’t doing anything to harm the planet, and we just tried to kill you for no reason at all. There, I’m sorry!”

“I think that’s as close to an apology as you’re going to get from him,” Dr. Connors sighed. “But on behalf of him and all members of Spiraling Out of Control, we all wish to apologize for everything we did to you...Oh, and we had no association with the Africa attack; that was all them.”

“Well, I sorta guessed that last one. They were pretty unorganized,” Miss Spiral chuckled. “But anyways, I forgive all of you. No hard feelings. Besides, everything worked out great in the end, right?”

“T-T-Thank you ma’am!” Dudley stuttered as he bowed his head. “It really means a lot to us!”

“Yeah, thanks toots,” Rick agreed, still uncaring. “Sorry about all that.”

“Not a problem guys! Like I said, I’ve got you all to thank for my current wonderful height!” the titanic mother laughed once more. “Oh! What’s the good news you guys have? Let me guess, they’ve made today Miss Ellen Spiral Day, right?”

“Not exactly, my dear.”Dr. Connors chuckled.”It’s actually several pieces of good news. First off, the Spiraling Out of Control group has transformed into a Pro-You group! The...’Spiraling Towards the Future’? They’ve become a charity, aiding those who had been...harmed from one of your...fits, or repairing property destroyed during your years as a giga giantess.”

“That’s wonderful, doc! I’m so glad they’ve taken a turn for the better!”

“Second of all, we’ve been studying you, and have mapped out an entirely new growth chart. You’re due for a new spurt in oh say....an hour or two?”

“Are...are you sure? Is it that soon?”

“Quite positive, and it’s going to be a big one....”

Dr. Connors turned around and pointed at their ship.”Before I relay the final piece of news, could you kindly bring up our rocket as well?”

“Of course.”Miss Spiral reached down and gently plucked up the tiny vehicle, setting it down beside the three specks on her finger with her free hand.”Now, we believe using the formula used to originally shrink you, but having the opposite effect, on clothing, we can grow some suitable outfits for you, so that you will not be indecent anymore.”

“That’s wonderful!”She cheered.

“Now, we’ve arranged many articles of clothing to choose from. A simple undergarment pairing of bra and panties, a nice summer dress, some lounging clothes...oh, and your favorite jogging attire, extra tight, just the way you like it. Plus, some flip-flops and sneakers if you like.”

“What are we waiting for then? Make ‘em grow for me!”

Wasting no time, Dr. Connors gently poured the serum on each of the items they had brought with them, watching as the mixture slowly became absorbed into the atoms of each article of clothing. The various outfits and shoes began to glow for a moment before returning to their normal state, seemingly normal to the naked eye.

“So, did it work?” the 10,000 mile woman wondered. “Oh, and could you grow me a pair of heels in the meantime too? A girl can never have too many pairs of shoes!” Admittedly, Miss Spiral never wore shoes on a regular basis, but she enjoyed having the option of wearing them if she so wished to.

“I’ll make sure to make a note of some high heels in your size when I return to the lab, but yes, I believe so...They should resonate with your body’s heat signature, so you should be able to grow what you’d like and keep what you don’t wish to wear smaller for as long as you’d like,” the doctor explained. “Oh, and any clothes you wear will enlarge perfectly along with you as well.”

“Oh, how wonderful!” Miss Spiral cheered. “Here, give ‘em here, I’ll change as soon as you guys leave!”

Nodding, the three men did as requested as they left the clothing on her massive digit. “Now then, we must be off for Earth once again. We’ll hopefully be in contact with you once again after your next spurt.”

“Great! Thank you so much everyone! Have a safe and wonderful trip back, and make sure to tell my kids that Mommy loves them!”

With that, the voyagers boarded the spaceship and entered in the coordinates to return to their homeworld, launching off the titanic woman’s finger as she waved goodbye to them.

“Now, let’s see...Let’s get comfy!”
14222211111111111111.title: The Continuous Adventures of Giga Miss Spiral

142222111111111111111.content:
She gently closed her hand around the clothes on her finger to get some heat flowing into them. In little under a minute, she began to feel fabric stretching against her skin, and a weight coming upon her hand. Little over a minute, her clothes were fully functional, appropriate for a woman of her magnitude.”Oh my!”She gasped.”My jogging shorts and sports bra...they look good as new! And those sneakers! So high-style! The dress is a little tacky, but beggars can’t be choosers...and why did they have to pick such a lacy bra and panties? Oh well, I think...”She slipped on the jogging shorts and sports bra easily, the elastic fabric molding over her perfect curves easily. With that, she slipped on her flip-flops, and watched with amazement as the other clothes began to shrink once they were void of her body heat. She made sure to stow them away safely in a pocket.

“Now, all I have to do is wait for that growth spurt! It’s going to be great!”

----

One Hour later

“Attention everyone,”

Dr. Connors was broadcasting all across the world from inside his rocket, heading straight towards Earth.

“If you would turn your televisions to the nearest news station, look up on your livecams, or simply gaze up at the sky, you will see Miss Ellen Spiral is about to grow once again, a spectacle one does not wish to miss.”

All across the globe, people turned their attentions towards the heavens to view the giant woman whose body rivaled the size of a small planet...and was about to become even larger. The denizens of Earth were delighted to finally see the massive mother clad in the familiar outfit she had worn up until a few days ago, pleased that they could stop shielding their children’s eyes from such a sight, in addition to reducing the amount of perverted men drooling over her naked form. The planet’s inhabitants watched eagerly to see Miss Spiral’s growth spurt occur from a third-person perspective, far away from the Earth and completely safe from her soon-to-be expanding frame.

Meanwhile, Miss Spiral’s two children watched on along with the rest of the planet, equally enthusiastic to see how much their colossal mother would enlarge.

“Man, how long’s it been since she’s grown again?” Michael asked.

“About six months or so,” Lily answered. “She’s definitely overdue for one, if not several.”

“Why do I get the feeling Mom’s gonna be huge after this?”

“Because she most likely will.”

Back on Mars, Miss Spiral could feel her body getting ready to grow, becoming excited herself to see how much height she would add on to her already immense stature.

“This is gonna be great!” she cheered. “Now to get off of this little planet to make sure I don’t accidentally crush it!”

Like she had done on earth, Miss Spiral bent at her knees and sprang upwards, launching herself into the emptiness of space. Just as she cleared Mars’s atmosphere, she felt herself begin to grow once more.It wasn’t like anything she had experience prehand with growing, this one felt almost...powerful, instinctual....orgasmic in a sense. With a soft moan, she quickly hit the 12,000 mile mark, but that seemed to be simply a warm up for what the rest of her spurt would be. The onlookers of the world would turn to the sky in awe as Miss Spiral’s image quickly began to fill the entire view of the planet, expanding into 15,000 miles, 20,000, and still no signs of stopping.

With her eyes closed and her mouth grinning, the monolithic mom continued in her new growth phase...

“Mmmm...Now THIS is quite the nice little boost,” Miss Spiral chuckled to herself as she continued to enlarge, her body now soaring past the 25,000 mile mark and still persisting.

The three cosmonauts had the best view of the woman’s latest round of size upgrades, floating in the vast void of space as her seemingly perfect body merely grew on and on and on with no end in sight. Soon enough, the spaceship they had travelled in had docked in the newly created Spiral Observation Station #5, ready to watch the remainder of her spurt while continuing to gain valuable scientific data on Miss Spiral’s unique DNA composition. Upon disembarking the ship, Dr. Connors immediately headed towards the station’s research wing, quickly becoming informed on the current situation.

“So, tell me, how large is she now?” he inquired.

“Um, well...” the junior scientist paused.

“What’s wrong? Spit it out already!”

“Well sir, Ellen Spiral...we...we miscalculated...”

“What do you mean we miscalculated?” Dr. Connors said as he raised his right eyebrow. “This growth of hers should end at 75,000 miles in height.”

“Well, she was 75,000 miles tall...about two minutes ago...”

“WHAT?!”

“Yes, apparently she’ll be growing much larger than we initially projected.”

“Do you have the new estimates already?”

“Yes sir, but...”

“But what?”

“Well, if these estimates are correct, Ellen Spiral may be over one million miles tall when all is said and done.”

All Dr. Connors could muster in response were wide eyes and a flabbergasted, dropped jaw wide open along with a few unintelligible words. For the first time in his life of science and intelligence, the doctor had nothing to say.

---

All the while, Miss Spiral kept her eyes closed, still feeling her expansion coming on in waves of sheer pleasure and power, coursing through her body fervently and just making her bigger and bigger by the second. As her growth stretched into the last remaining moments of the spurt, she slowly opened her eyes, feeling the sense of her expansion quickly leave. It almost made her sad, but she knew it would come again eventually, whether it be another day, week, or even a whole year. She would wait. But for now, she would enjoy her new height...

She saw black, empty space, the occasional star twinkling here and there.

“Hmm? Where’d I go?”She mused to herself, turning her head this way and that.”That was a long growth...but I don’t see anything...”She looked down, a vantage point she had become accustomed to, and almost exploded into a fit of pure laughter. Before her, floating harmlessly in front of her naval, a tiny red speck.

“Mars...”Miss Spiral whispered to herself as she reached down towards the once comparable planet to her size. Grabbing the speck with her right hand, she grasped the small orb between her index finger and thumb before bringing it in front of her large green eyes. “My, look how tiny it’s gotten...And to think I was just small enough to live there only a little while ago!” Miss Spiral giggled happily, almost accidentally crushing the minute object between her fingers. “Well, at least I had a nice little boost just now. I wonder just how big I am now? Oh well, at least my clothes grew with me this time, and even though I’m big now, I’ll be even bigger later!” With a cheerful smile, Miss Spiral deposited the small planet inside of her belly-button for the time being. “Now, let’s see where the Earth went to...I can’t wait to show my little darlings just how much Mommy’s grown!”
142222111111111111111.title: The Adventures of Giga Miss Spiral, Pt. 2

1422221111111111111111.content:
Scanning the depths of space for a full minute, the goliath of a woman soon spotted a small blue-green sphere off in the distance. “Ah, there it is! Don’t worry everyone, I’m coming to visit!” Miss Spiral paused for a moment before proceeding. “Or maybe I should just keep you all with me. I’m practically big enough to be my own little Me-verse!” With another gleeful chuckle, the massive mother began her now much shorter journey to her home planet.

Hovering in front of it, the galactic giantess could hardly believe the small blue speck with hints of green on it was something she once walked upon. Peering down at it, she could only imagine what she looked like to the tiny invisible people she once identified with.

On earth, it was a whole other story as every on the planet looked up in awe at the living goddess. Miss Spiral’s sheer size couldn’t even be fully comprehended, she was simply a massive blur that took up the sky, no definite shape to her gargantuan height. But when she spoke, everyone listened.

“Hello down there, little earth!”She giggled as she waved at the speck.”As you can see, little ol’ me has gotten a lot bigger! And, I’ve decided for a change of scenery for you all! Earth’s stayed in that one spot for so long, I believe it’s gotten rather boring. Wouldn’t it be much more fun if I placed you all in my bust? Ooh, or how about in my nipple! That’ll tickle! or how about in between my toes? I did want that toe-cation, but it looks like I’ve outgrown that option...”She giggled.

Everyone on earth was equally scared, hopeful, and confused as the titaness’s words. It would be...interesting to see what Miss Spiral would do to earth, but what about the sunlight they required for their plants and for the natural cycle of day and night? But oddly enough, everyone was okay with what she was going to do. It wasn’t like anybody could stop her anyway. Nothing could.

After thinking about where to place the planet for a few minutes, Miss Spiral finally came to a decision. “Alrighty! I think I’ll put you all in my...Oh, what’s that?”

Just as she was about to relocate the Earth onto a section of her body, the titaness spotted a large meteor headed straight towards the planet. While several times the size of the planet, the asteroid only appeared as a slightly larger speck before the goddess of a woman. The people of Earth began to panic wildly at their imminent doom.

“My babies!” Miss Spiral shouted as she too began to spring into mother-mode. “Hang on kids! Mommy’ll save you!” Wasting no time, she quickly plucked the hurdling meteor from its path and swiftly crush it in her hand, letting its remains sprinkle harmlessly across the galaxy. “Ah, there we go! Now you’re all safe!”

Every single person on Earth rejoiced as the massive woman known as Ellen Spiral single-handedly, both literally and metaphorically, saved the planet from destruction. Cheers of joy began to ring out from every corner of the globe as countless humans sang of her prasies.

“Oh, there’s no need to thank me,” Miss Spiral smiled modestly. “Just doing my duty as a massive mom! Now where was I?...Oh, right, time to choose your new location on me!”

Miss Spiral gently waved her hand around the speck, the motion of her palm slowly moving the Earth. She wouldn’t dare try to touch it and risk crushing some continents with her fingers. This way was much more subtle and safe. With a few sweeps of her hand around the world, the planet was making its journey towards its newest destination, Miss Spiral’s chest, two orbs barely contained within the elastic of her sports bra, planetary in their own right as well. To the inhabitants of the planet, it was as if a great wind had come over the entire planet, moving it towards the massive new ‘planets’ that blocked out the sky.

“Almost theeerrr-eeerrre!” Miss Spiral giggled as the Earth drew closer to her ample chest. Once the planet had almost collided with the mammoth mammaries, the monolithic mother gently bent downwards and adjusted her sports bra slightly, smiling as the small orb gently nestled itself between her bust. “Ah, there we go! Now hold on tight, I wanna make sure you’re all nice and comfy down there.”

Standing her body back up to her full height, Miss Spiral adjusted her sports bra once more, making sure the Earth was wedged comfortably in her bust before completely enclosing it in the elastic darkness of her clothing. The mom’s immense orbs held the planet firmly in place within her cleavage, acting both as planet-sized retainers and guardians of the Earth.

“There we go! That’s much better!” Miss Spiral chuckled as she gently pat her bust. “Now my little darlings will always be safe, and close to Mommy’s heart!”

What she said was true, with her words ringing in everybody’s ears, over the muffling flesh that encompassed the entire globe, her heartbeat echoed across the whole planet, giving a air of peace and calm to the human populace.

“Hmm...what to do now, everyone?”She peered down at her chest, jiggling it ever so slightly.”Now that you’re all along for the ride, I suppose I’ll have to be extra careful...but don’t worry, I always am!”

“I could...see what else is out there beyond our little pocket in the universe....play with some of the planets here....go tanning near the sun...or just wait for my next growth spurt. But that might take a while...”She smacked her hand against her forehead.”Silly me! I really should have asked Dr. Connors about the rest of my growth chart! Now he’s absolutely too teeny for me to even hear anymore!”

The realization came quick. Humans were much too small for her to speak with or even interact with anymore. She was astronomical now. The feeling left a quiet tinge of sadness in her, but was quickly replaced with the fact that she still could protect them all.

“You know, they may all be tiny, but being this big is actually the best thing I could ever ask for!” Miss Spiral giggled to herself. “I mean, how many other people can say they’re protecting an entire planet with just their chest? None that I know of, at least. Besides, if I wasn’t this huge anyways, the Earth would’ve been destroyed a few minutes ago! In a way, it’s like I’m like the planet’s personal protector!”

“Let’s see...Hmmm...You know, depending on when I’m due for my next spurt, they might have communication technology by then so I can talk to them,” she pondered. “They did make my new clothes grow with me, so they might be able to do something like this too...Oh well! Time to go work on my tan!”

With a content smile, the gargantuan woman slowly floated towards the sun, her 1.5 million mile body visible throughout the solar system.

Meanwhile, back on Earth, the planet’s denizens began to try to adjust to their new placement within the solar system. Due to the intense opaqueness of her sports bra, no sunlight was able to reach the Earth’s surface, and the planet’s scientists began to discover a way to remedy the current situation. Nonetheless, they were all thankful for Miss Spiral’s actions.
1422221111111111111111.title: The Adventures of Giga Miss Spiral, Pt.3

14222211111111111111111.content:
Dr. Connors sat down at his desk and rubbed his temples, sighing in disbelief at the giant woman’s newest size. She truly was a goddess. He looked up at the contents on his desk with weary eyes, but a happy smile. She had become his life’s work, and he wouldn’t let her cosmic scale get him down. He had so much more plans. A small satellite was to be deployed to her ear for communication purposes, and from there, many more functions would be made. They could actually live on her! Setting up new structures that wouldn’t be destroyed with her movements would be a challenge, but one he would gladly take. As for the sunlight to reach earth, he supposed he could convince her to wear that thinner bra every now and again, or go in the nude if she wished, but he really did have to get her those heels soon...

He waved his hand, and an assistant came by.

“Yes sir?”

“Have that satellite launched with two crewman. I want to tell Ellen about...plans for the future. Just...make sure they have their thermo-suits on. She’s close to the sun, and those temperatures will melt any normal human into dust.”

“Yes sir.”

Approximately thirty minutes after the order was given, the satellite was ready for launch. Using the latest in military technology, the metallic capsule was equipped with the latest in rocket booster technology; after escaping from the darkness of Miss Spiral’s sports bra, it would only be about a five minute journey to the face of the living goddess.

“Is everything all set?” Dr. Connors asked as he boarded the satellite.

“Yes sir, everything’s ready!”

“Alright, launching!”

With that, the satellite began its expedition to the top of the over 1 million mile mother, managing to escape the tight elastic fabric only barely.

“Sir, did you have to really make this bra so tight on her?” the pilot asked.

“It was her favorite outfit. I had to remake it just to her exact specifications,” the doctor replied. “Besides, it IS her signature outfit after all. Oh, that reminds me...Lieutenant, do you have the package?”

“Yes sir, I’ve got it right here.”

“Excellent...”

The satellite rocket higher and higher until it reached its destination after maneuvering around some stray hairs thicker than the planet itself. It went onto float deep in her ear canal, the two men aboard would leave via a secondary escape pod.”Alright...”The pilot flipped a switch, and the satellite was a go. He began speaking into a mouthpiece.”Testing...testing...Miss Spiral, can you hear us?”

“Hmm?”She titled her head, sending the small machine even deeper into her ear, threatening to crash it into some wax.”Who said that?”

“Us, the tiny people. We’ve established a communications link within your ear, so whenever need be, you and Dr. Connors, or anyone in particular, may speak with you.”

“Oh that’s just wonderful!”

“Thank you, Miss Spiral. Now, we have a few words for you. The earth is in...curious condition. Our plantlife won’t survive long without sunlight, so might we ask...you remove your bra?”

“....”

“Just until we can find some way to filter light in through your clothing?”

Miss Spiral thought about complying for a moment, yet she felt incredibly comfortable in her favorite outfit. It was a tough decision to make, but in the end, the mammoth mother chose an alternative route...

“Oh, that’s all you little guys need? Pssh, that’s easy!” she giggled as she waved her right hand in mid-air as if what she was planning was going to be no problem for her. “If you need the Sun...then I’ll just become the Sun!”

“W-What?!” the three men yelled in unison, completely flabbergasted at the idea.

“Yeah, it’ll be easy! Just give me a few minutes and Earth’ll have all the light it’ll ever need!” she exclaimed with a giddy smile.

“A-Are you sure about this Ellen?” Dr. Connors asked. “By the laws of science, this shouldn’t even be possible...”

“Of course! I saw it in a book once, so it has to work!”

The men looked at each other once more, all of them unsure as to her plan of action. “Ummm...Alright then, that sounds good.”

“Great! I just hope lil’ ol’ me’ll be big enough by the time I get there!” she chuckled. “Now, what else would you like to talk about?”

“Ah yes...we have a package...”

“Of what?”She piqued curiously.

“Of a device Dr. Connors invented...it will gauge your current height for you and relay when your next growth spurt will hit...”

“I’ve been needing that! Thank you oh so very much!”

“Now, could you move some of your hair away from your ear? We would like to fly safely back to earth.”

“Not a problem~”She sweeped the hair away from her right ear to behind her head, giving the small men a safe and free way to travel back home to Earth in their pods.

“Now Ellen, I have some things to discuss with you...”

“Go right ahead doc!”She cheered as she could hear his words clear as day.

“What do you intend to do by...becoming the sun?”

“Just trust me doc, all in good time...”

“But our plants have little time as it is...if you were to simply remove your bra...”

“You silly little pervs! All in good time!”

He sighed.”Very well, now onto business. We have ideas of actually moving some of the populace onto you, colonizing your body in a sense. Is that alright?”

“Well, if you really have to, just wait until there’s more of me to go around first!” the mighty mom chuckled. “Just make sure everything’s safe before you start. I wouldn’t want anyone to get hurt.”

“Ah, I see. I’ll take that into consideration,” the doctor mentally noted.

“I mean, I’ve still gotta be me too, ya know - the biggest mom and model ever!” Miss Spiral added, even though she had never modeled before in her life but was always asked to become one. “I guess you can say I’m a momdel!” she laughed at her own pun.

“Right, I wouldn’t want to overburden you with this, of course,” Dr. Connors suggested. “If all else fails, we could always live with you rather than on you as you continue to grow larger.”

“Sounds great to me, doc!” she cheered enthusiastically. “Anything else to talk about?”

“Oh, well, um, let’s see here...Oh, I did manage to get you those high heels you wanted.”

“You did?! That’s wonderful news! Now I can look even more momdel-y in some cute footwear! Thank you all so much!” Miss Spiral thanked him once again. “I can’t wait to try them on!”

“They’ll be with you shortly...in a few hours or so we’ll send another vessel to land on your palm. You will wait exactly thirty minutes to give the men time to evacuate carefully before you close your hand and make the heels grow to match you.”

“Thanks doc!”

“You’re welcome, Ellen. We’ll be in touch.”Connors ended his talk with her, turning off his microphone and thus ending his voice inside her ear.
14222211111111111111111.title: The Adventures of Giga Miss Spiral, Pt.4

142222111111111111111111.content:
”Ah, back to tanning...”She said to herself, slowly dozing off into her fit of slumber in front of the sun, her favorite tanning spot in the solar system now.

---

“Alright...”Connors cracked his knuckles as he laid out various plans before him on his desk. One stamped Miss Spiral’s next growth spurt, bound to happen within a few days; she would be noted by the satellite in her ear when the time came. Another had a diagram of a structure made of hyper-tense metals, ones that could bend, but not break for the buildings to be placed upon the astronomical woman. Her natural pull of gravity would hold any tiny humans to her, as if she was a planet all her own. And from the latest scans and readings the Observation Stations had gathered, she even produced oxygen from her skin. Miss Spiral wasn’t destined to end the human race with her size; she was to save it.

“How...How can this be?” the doctor asked himself as he looked over her readings of the planet-sized woman. “She’s releasing oxygen from her pores...This shouldn’t be possible. Have I made her into a living goddess through my serums? That could be a possibility, but could they have really altered her already mutated genetics by such an extreme amount? Well, I suppose I’ll have to take a few samples of her once again to confirm this data, but in the meantime, I must continue to monitor her.”

As the people of the Earth began to adjust to their new life between Miss Spiral’s chest, an announcement went out to all citizens, alerting them that the light problem facing the planet would be resolved in a few days during the mother’s next growth spurt. Some jumped to the initiative of inducing a growth spurt to speed up the process, but the majority of the people resigned themselves to waiting, knowing that the issue would be solved soon enough. In the meantime, another vessel prepared to launch from the planet...

“Is the cargo secured?”

“Yes, sir!”

“Alright then, prepare for takeoff.”

The second vessel took off for Miss Spiral’s left hand, her palm held wide open for the tinies to safely land upon it like it was an entirely different planet. Within a hour’s time they landed on a patch of skin cells that could outsize any desert on the planet and deposited her heels onto the rough, fleshy landscape. A signal was sent to her, and Miss Spiral began her countdown to thirty minutes. “One mississippi....two mississippi....” she giggled to herself. And in that short time, they had returned to their home world conveniently stationed in her gargantuan busom. “Alright, let’s get these bad boys a fit...” she closed her hand, and waited for the heels to grow...

---

Three Days Later
Within three short days, all Miss Spiral had done was lay out in front of the solar body and tan. She had no other necessity at the moment, so such a thing was possible for her. Her skin had smoldered to a beautiful golden-bronze glow, giving her long brown hair an almost luscious glow and making her bright green eyes pop even more.

“...Ellen?” Dr. Connors’ voice echoed in her ear, the satellite still fully functional.

“Yeeeessss?” she piqued in reply.

“It’s time.”

“Ooh! Those days just flew by! How big am I gonna get now Doc?”

“...”

“Hello? You there?”

“Yes, it’s just...It’s going to be another big one...”

Miss Spiral simply giggled in reply. “Oh, you’re always so funny, Doc. When are you guys gonna realize that they aren’t really big to me? Heck, I don’t think I’m even big yet!”

“Riiiiiight...Well, regardless, we estimate that you’ll be about fifty times your current height, if not just a bit more. At your size range, it’s hard to make completely accurate predictions; estimates are the closest thing we can make unfortunately.”

“Well, that’s just fine. At least I know how big I’ll be...sorta...” the massive mother chuckled to herself. “Just make sure everyone’s prepared down there. Wouldn’t want lil’ ol’ Earth to be surprised by me growing again!”

“Don’t worry, in the past few days, we’ve made the proper precautions,” Dr. Connors affirmed. “Everyone is readying themselves for the upcoming earthquakes your body will cause by growing, but don’t worry, these quakes will only occur during this spurt. After this, all of your growths will be havoc free.”

“Oh, that’s great news! Glad my chest’ll be safe for everyone. See, I know what I’m doing...” Before continuing on, Miss Spiral felt a familiar sensation traveling throughout her body. “Oooooh, I can feel it coming on now! Doc, I’ll hold it off for as long as I can, just make sure everyone’s ready.”

“Right.” Picking up his telecommunication device, the scientist radioed his home planet. “Attention everyone, Ellen Spiral is about to grow. Please ready Operation Pillow Earth in your towns and cities. The duration of the spurt will be unknown, but be ready as soon as possible. She’ll grow at any moment now.”

“Is everyone prepared?” Miss Spiral asked, trying to delay the glorious urge to expand building within her. “I can hold it in a little longer if you need me to.”

“No, I’ve alerted everyone,” he replied. “Grow.”

“Phew! I never thought you’d say that!” the monolithic mom chuckled. “Alright, time to shine!”

At once she stopped resisting the urge of growth within her, and in an instant it surged through every cell of her body, supercharging her into a massive spurt.”Ooh...”The cheery woman smiled wide as she kept her eyes open this time to witness the diminishing sun before her. It was a funny thing indeed. She could remember being a tiny, tiny person, back when she was just skyscraper-sized. She would look up to the sun and imagine how big it was, almost fathomless to the mere mind. But here it was, shrinking - or in correct terms, she was growing - right before her, and it created a sense of giddiness along with the feeling of growth. Quickly it became a beach ball, then a bowling ball, children’s ball, and was becoming smaller still.

Meanwhile, on Earth

It was a costly operation, but a successful one. Girders of the super-tense, super-flexible metals had been shipped to the highest survivable points on earth, a small frame set up. If any of Miss Spiral’s body made contact with the planet, the beams would fully take on the force and protect the planet. It was a security measure, but entirely unnecessary.

The human populace looked up in awe as the sky seemed to grow darker and darker, the world disappearing deeper and deeper into the monolithic mom’s cleavage until it entirely became too small to be held by her breasts; instead, the planet vanished into a small pore of the V of her boobs.

Slowly, her growth came to a stop, and Miss Spiral looked down towards the sun. “Wow...This is...so amazing...” she mused, completely in awe of her latest size upgrade. “I can barely even see the Sun anymore...”

“Attention Dr. Connors! Dr. Connors, can you hear me?” a voice called out from within the doctor’s satellite. “Are you alright? Do you have the latest readings?”

“Yes, I’m fine, but how’s the planet holding up?” he asked.

“Earth is perfectly fine. No contact was made by her chest against any portion of the planet.”

“That’s good to hear. Anyways, it seems Ellen Spiral grew larger than we projected once again...”

“How big is she?”

“100 million miles...” Miss Spiral chuckled as she grasped the practically microscopic ball of flame in her fingers, making sure to handle it gently. “And to think that I once used to look up at you...Oh well, I’m glad that I’m going to be your replacement!” With a sudden motion of her hand, the mammoth woman deposited the star into her mouth and swallowed it whole, surprising Dr. Connors at her action.

“Mayday, mayday! Prepare the planet for the Blackout Plan!” he quickly shouted over his radio. “She’s just consumed the-Wait a second, something’s happening...”

Almost as soon as Miss Spiral consumed the Sun, her body began to glow brightly, emitting the same light the star had given out earlier, only on a larger scale. From deep within her chest, Earth was bathed in an appropriate amount of solar rays once again, their light problem now solved.

“Sir, you won’t believe this! There’s light on Earth again!”

“Ellen Spiral...” Dr. Connors began, “...she’s become a living goddess...”

“Well, to be honest sir,”The voice on the other end of his satellite feed replied.”...She’s always been a goddess.”


“...Agreed.”Connors replied, flabbergasted as always with Ellen Spiral. He switched links with the intercom and went to speaking with Miss Spiral again.”You’ve done it again, Ellen...”He breathed out in relief.”You’ve saved us all.”

“Oh, no need to be so flattering, Doc! Just doing what a mom’s gotta do!”She giggled in reply.

“And humble as ever...”

“So Doc, is everything okay down there with you tinies?”

“Yes...”He replied, checking various recording instruments and screens of locations across the globe.”Everything is in perfect, natural balance. Plants have their light, it’s day once more in appropriate places of the world, and all you have to do is shut off your light every twelve hours to make way for ‘night’.”

“I think I can manage that, I’ve gotten good at keeping time now.”

“On behalf of the human race....thank you, Miss Ellen Spiral.”

“Oh stop, you’re making me blush!”
142222111111111111111111.title: The Final Chapter of Giga Miss Spiral

142222111111111112.content:
“I....I just can’t take it anymore.”She looked down with absolute disgust in her face.”I give, and give, and GIVE, but all you people do is take me for granted! You bomb me, you threaten me! You attack me with no FUCKING reason whatsoever!”She screamed, shattering more than a few eardrums and mirrors across planet. She grinned maliciously as she raised her right foot and brought it down ever so slowly upon Latin America, the entire landmass destroyed instantly underneath her sole.”Well, NO MORE. I hereby declare you all my SLAVES, and I am to be your GODDESS. Your angry, ANGRY goddess.”With that, Miss Spiral cackled, a deep, boneshaking chill running down the spines of every person on the planet.
