The people of Earth began to regret all that they had done to the massive mother; she had done nothing but good no matter what size she became, yet they only continued to fear and antagonize her despite her countless acts of kindness. Everyone across the globe knew that they had contributed in some way to this point, either by talking bad about her, working or supporting Spiraling Out of Control, or by any other negative means which finally caused Miss Spiral to snap. With her most recent size boost, the people knew that this goliath could never be stopped, and now that they had pissed her off, they could do nothing but accept whatever decisions her 10,000 mile frame chose to implement.

Only about a step’s journey from the new goddess, the woman’s two children looked on in amazement at their television, watching as their mother intentionally ended an entire subcontinent beneath her enormous foot.

“Oh no...This isn’t good...” Michael gulped. “Mom finally snapped...”

“Did you see what she just did?” Lily asked. “She stomped on all those people...I’ve only seen Mom this mad once, and she didn’t stop until she was satisfied with the outcome...”

“I think she’s finally let herself believe what everyone’s been portraying her as: An evil goddess bent on destroying the world.”

They both hoped that these facts were true, or more than just earth was in trouble.

“Now, what should I do as your new goddess...?”Miss Spiral’s face remained plastered with a grin of absolute wickedness and malice.”I believe I need to...come to terms with the rest of the world about this. I mean, not everybody just witnessed me destroy hundreds of your puny jets and boats, plus, some of you microbes might’ve missed Latin America...it’s kind of paste underneath my foot now.”She cackled.”Attention leaders of the world, I want each and every one of you to meet me, right here in one hour’s time! If not...well, let’s just say your country won’t last very long in the new world order...”Miss Spiral giggled almost maniacally as she raised her foot and picked off some rubble that had gotten stuck to the bottom of her sole, mountains and entire cities falling to the ocean below.

The heads of state of each country began to assemble their homeland’s fastest transportation vehicles, eager to make it to the goddess’s meeting point in the desired time; they did not want to anger the furious woman any more than she already was. Miss Spiral stood still as she watched over her planet, continuing to pick off more rubble off of her foot to kill some time as the leaders began to arrive next to her other foot, taking in the powerful and unavoidable smell of her feet upon arrival. All the while, the titaness’s mind continued to plan her next course of action, her anger and fury only continuing to grow with every second that passed.

“Hmmm...You know what? I’m starting to get bored...” she chuckled. “I’m changing that one hour to thirty minutes, same conditions apply. Hope you can still make it~” Miss Spiral laughed, malice filling her voice.

About 25 minutes later when the time period was completed, Miss Spiral bent downwards at her feet and quickly grabbed all that was in front of her foot, not caring how quickly she raised them up to her eye level. “Let’s see...I see some of you little germs didn’t listen to me...I’ll make sure their countries will pay the price...” she giggled wickedly.

“Now, I bet you’re all wondering why I gathered you all here,”She paused to give them a chance to reply, only to cut them off by shaking her hand and chuckling rather darkly at their misfortune, some leaders falling into the cracks and lines of her hand.”You must think that I’m still not such a bad girl, I want to come to terms with you all, establish a treaty or document or something.”

Another pause, only none replied this time.

“You would be right....but you’re wrong. Horribly, horribly wrong. I’m going to kill you all!”She giggled as she slowly began scrunching her hand into a fist, her monolithic fingers coming down upon the leaders rapidly.”I can’t let you all just live and rally some troops or something....”With that, she tightly clenched her fist, crushing them all in a split second.”It’s not like any of you can stop me anyways...”

With the leaders of entire nations gone and no central power to oppose her, Miss Spiral turned her attention to her favorite little country, the USA. She didn’t even have to walk anymore to reach it, the tiny landmass was right there by her feet.”And as for you,”She pointed down at the country.”I think a little...redecorating is in order if this is going to be the ‘birthplace of the living goddess’.”

Your accents are far too annoying...so, as a celebration, you pathetic nothings get to be destroyed as well! Feel honored!”She cackled as she dipped her foot into the ocean bordering the edge of the country, digging her foot deeper and deeper into the earth until she felt magma touch her toe tips. She slowly, almost playfully, began to squeeze her massive mammaries together, the piece of land instantly obliterated against the soft mounds pressing against it.”There...aaaaaand....done!”She made sure it was finished by cupping her boobs in each hand and grinding whatever remained into dust. But some pieces of green remained, signaling to the living goddess that survivors of her rampage remained.”Buh-bye, you germs!”She cackled, and in one fluid motion, raised her fist, bent down, and punched the earth, her fist going straight through the planet and leaving a massive hole that quickly filled with magma and countless gallons of the surrounding seas. Miss Spiral pulled her hand out of the planet, wiping off some of the molten hot goo from her forearm as if the inferno-like heat it produced was a nuisance.

“Almost done with finishing up my world tour...just a few more annoyances remaining...”

Now all that remained of the destroyed planet was South and North America, only about 35% of the Earth’s population remaining after Miss Spiral’s incredible rampage. Deciding that she would save her home continent for last, the new goddess turned her attention towards the southern landmass, eager to deal out more of her anger on her countless slaves. With two small steps, Miss Spiral loomed high over the doomed landscape, shaking her right foot of its debris high over the continent, crushing several dozen cities before her true wrath began.

“All that forest and nothing good coming from your pathetic little land...I should’ve taken care of you all first!”

With a slight chuckle, Miss Spiral bent her knees slightly before leaping a small amount into the air and turning her stomach towards the ground. Then, as she extended her body to its full length in mid-air, she playfully shouted, “Look out below!”

With an earth-shattering thud, her body slammed into the planet, causing the entire continent to sink heavily into the Earth’s crust, a massive wave of lava soon rising up and gently warming Miss Spiral’s toned stomach. “Ah, thanking me with a nice heat massage? Well, that won’t get you spared from me!”

She stood back with a giggle, removing any lava or earth crust from her flat stomach. She looked down, but her face flashed almost disappointment. In replace of South America, an imprint of her body stretched into the ground. All that remained of the destroyed world was a partially already destroyed North America. Miss Spiral bellowed out a menacing, terrifying laugh that rang through the cosmos.”Aww...I’ve already broken almost all of my toys!”She turned with a wide, toothy grin and bright, evil green eyes.”At least my....’homeland’ can still entertain it’s goddess...”

She reached down and scooped up a handful of the states she had divided up and quickly downed them into her mouth like they were snacks, smacking her lips with satisfaction. Another set she flung into space, another met it’s end by being grinded into dust between her fingers. She continued this process for about ten minutes, going through all fifty states of the USA, disposing of each in a different manner, until all that remained was the small patch of land containing her hometown and some surrounding countryside. The titanic woman gazed down at it almost uncertainly, but it was replaced with the wicked grin she had wore during her entire destruction of humankind.

“Ready or not, your goddess is coming...”She cackled as she reached down towards it.

“Um, is it me, or is this looking like Mom’s about to do something with us?” Michael gulped as his mother’s hand completely engulfed their hometown.

“I don’t think this is gonna be good...” Lily agreed. “But it’s not like we can do anything at this point. Mom’s just too big.”

Cackling wildly, Miss Spiral slowly raised the plot of land in front of her eyes, gazing at it with the utmost certainty of what she was about to do.

“You know, I’ve been thinking...and a goddess doesn’t have a homeland, a hometown, or anything home-like. The only thing I need is a large throne fit for my immense, beautiful form!” she laughed, her voice at such a close range deafening almost all in the city in her palm. “And looking at all of you now, I never realized that my so-called home would be the thing that finally makes me a true goddess...once I’ve destroyed you all of course. Then, I’ll be truly almighty...No, beyond that...I’ll be Momnipotent!”

The light in her eye told them all they needed to know. She wasn’t the loving mother they once knew, she was a powerful, vengeful goddess, and her wrath upon the world that had wronged her was about to be complete.

“Bye bye, you insignificant nothings...”She whispered, arching her index finger, preparing to flick the entire town into space and watch it crumble away into nothings.

Only for a tiny, tiny tingly sensation down by her toes to interrupt her. Peering down curiously, the giant woman had to squint her eyes to properly see so far below. Fighter Jets. Boats. The remnants of Spiraling Out of Control had somehow avoided her until this moment.

Dr. Connors stood aboard the largest battleship in their fleet, the mighty vessel not even comparable to the dirt in between her toeprint lines, but this was humanity’s last stand against the towering being. A fight they knew they would lose, but one they would not go down without trying.

So instead she just slammed her other breast into the neighboring lands. They never stood a chance.

"That."

No one saw what Ruth just did, but they felt it. A quake echoed throughout the planet and they knew to be afraid. If she willed it, they too would meet that fate. Ruth knew this too and couldn't get rid of her smile, "So what's stopping me hmm? Give me a reason."

There was no way to answer of course, but their actions could prove something. "You know what guys...? I think I figured out just what to do with you all."
15531122.title: Playtime on a MASSIVE Scale

info.brief_description: Live out your life....just really, REALLY huge.
info.description:
Yeah....so basically, this is the exact opposite of my other famous interactive, 'Your Life Smaller', which suffice to say, I am extremely grateful to Lelouch(he helped write most of it), and to all you readers out there. To quench your thirst for GTS, here's another interactive from moi.

Now, the story depends on which character you choose to be. Will you follow the tale of a kind giantess, or a destroyer of worlds? You decide.

The world, since the giantess was born, has accustomed to her. No matter what size she is, most of the planet either has a neutral or kind disposition towards her. Even the most successful business companies have pitched in to generate clothing, food, and shelter for one such as her size.

Heights To Choose From

*Amazon
-Your giantess is 12-20ft. in height. Has trouble fitting into most small buildings. Most people are only knee height to her.

*Average
-Size ranges from 50-100ft. in size. An average home reachers her shin. People are like toys, barely the size of her thumb.

*Big
-She's 500-1000ft. tall. She's easily a head, or even a whole torso taller than most skyscrapers. Normal people have become ants.

*Mega
-Now we're getting up there. Your giantess's size scales on a 50-100 mile tall frame, most of a city's skyline and countryside dominated by her toes alone. People are mere dust specks now.

*Giga
-Here we go. One of the biggest sizes around. Easily going from 500 miles....to infinity. This giantess is vast on a grand cosmic scale, and beyond. People are insignifigant, nothing, microscopic germs to you.


Main Characters
Who will you choose to be?

Name: Molly Ethans
Age: 17
Gender: Female
Personality: Quite shy and anti-social. Whatever size is chosen, Molly will try to be the kindest giantess she could be, trying to prevent as much damage as possible.
Appearance: Molly is....hard to describe. In a social click setting, she's an 'Anti Goth' Goth. She's dyed her short feathered hair a stunning bright orange, and wears an ensemble of an orange tank top, which covers her C-cups nicely, black leather belts and leather bands all up her arms, a tight black plaid skirt, and knee-high black boots with large treads and orange lacings. All of this compliments her pale skin nicely, but doesn't match her sweet personality.
(Molly is originally a character from Awesomex18)

Name: Vera Cartington
Age: 20
Gender: Female
Personality: As snobbish and bitchy as a girl could get. Her size, along with having the richest daddy in the world, has corrupted her perception of everything around her, seeing everything as inferior and unworthy. Whatever size chosen, if Vera doesn't get her way, a rampage is bound to happen, and people let it happen and pray she doesn't come their way. Because of Joseph Cartington's(Vera's father) money and influence, nobody thinks to stop her.
Appearance: Slender frame outlined by golden tanned skin, crisp blonde hair that goes down her back, a pouty face that decieves her intentions. Usually wears sweaters of the finest silks which enunciates her massive chest, Bordering F cup, along with tight blue jeans and matching flip-flops.

Name: Jasmine 'Jaz' Truitt
Age: 16
Gender: Female
Personality: In your face, rude, and to the point, is what describes Jaz. Despite this, she's a rather nice girl, if not a bit loud. Whichever size is chosen for her, Jaz will be a nice giantess, if not a tad mischievious.
Appearance: Dark, cocoa brown skin, black hair cut to her shoulder, a nice face with glasses. Wears normal short-sleeve t-shirts of black or white with jeans and converse shoes. Makes up for her average attire with D, bordering DD cup breasts and a butt to die for.
(Jaz originally is a character from here: http://www.writing.com/main/interact/item_id/1564499-Cheating-Death


Rules
